src: Diego Cocca wird neuer Nationaltrainer von Mexiko
ref: Diego Cocca will become the new national team trainer for Mexico
draft_translation: Diego Cocca becomes the new national coach of Mexico
final_translation: Diego Cocca becomes the new national coach of Mexico

src: Im Sommer 2026 richtet Mexiko gemeinsam mit den USA und Kanada die WM mit dann erstmals 48 Mannschaften aus. Cocca tritt die Nachfolge von Gerardo Martino an, dessen Vertrag nach dem frühen WM-Aus in Katar nicht verlängert wurde. Der 50-Jährige zählte bis vor wenigen Tagen nicht zu den Favoriten für den Posten. Er hatte erst im November als Coach des mexikanischen Clubs Tigres übernommen. Seine überraschende Berufung zum Nationaltrainer löste Ärger im Verein aus.
ref: In the summer of 2026, Mexico will host the World Cup together with the USA and Canada, which will include 48 teams for the first time. Cocca takes over from Gerardo Martino, whose contract was not extended after the premature World Cup exit in Qatar. Up until a few days ago, the 50-year-old was not considered a favorite for the position. He had just taken over as a coach for the Mexican Tigres Club in November. His surprising appointment as national team trainer sparked anger among the team.
draft_translation: In 2026, Mexico will jointly host the World Cup with the USA and Canada, featuring for the first time 48 teams. Cocca takes over from Gerardo Martino, whose contract was not extended after the early exit in Qatar. The 50-year-old was not considered a favorite for the position until recently. He had only taken over as coach of the Mexican club Tigres in November. His unexpected appointment as national team coach caused controversy within the club.

src: Geesthacht: Neue Beetschilder sollen zum Nachpflanzen animieren
ref: Geesthacht: New bed signs intended to encourage replanting
draft_translation: Geesthacht: New beet growers should encourage replanting
final_translation: Geesthacht: New beet growers are to encourage replanting

src: Franko Stein (FD Umwelt, links) und Friedhelm Ringe (Nabu) stellen die Pflanzenschilder in den Beeten der Fußgängerzone auf.
ref: Franko Stein (Environmental Services, left) and Friedhelm Ringe (Nature and Biodiversity Conservation Union) place the plant signs in the beds in the pedestrian zone.
draft_translation: Franko Stein (FD Umwelt, left) and Friedhelm Ringe (Nabu) set up the plant signs in the flower beds of the pedestrian zone.
final_translation: Franko Stein (FD Umwelt, left) and Friedhelm Ringe (Nabu) place the plant signs in the beds of the pedestrian zone.

src: Zur Aktion "Geesthacht blüht auf" gehört auch die Information darüber, was dort gerade blüht - aktuell in den Farben Weiß und Rosa.
ref: The "Geesthacht in bloom" campaign also includes information on what is currently in bloom – currently in the colors of white and pink.
draft_translation: The action "Geesthacht blüht auf" also includes information about what is currently blooming there - currently in white and pink colors.
final_translation: The event "Geesthacht blüht auf" also includes information about what is currently blooming there - currently in white and pink colors.

src: Geesthacht. "Geesthacht blüht auf" lautet eine Aktion des Nabu in Kooperation mit der Stadtverwaltung. Unter Mitwirkung von vielen Freiwilligen von Vereinen, Schulen, Kindertagesstätten, Unternehmen und Institutionen wurden seit 2015 Tausende von Blumenzwiebeln und Pflanzen in die Erde gebracht. Ziel: Im Geesthachter Stadtgebiet sollen weitflächig Blühinseln entstehen, auf denen Insekten zu jeder Zeit Nahrung finden. "Bei günstiger Wetterlage fliegen die Bienen schon im Januar aus, um Nahrung zu suchen", sagt Friedhelm Ringe vom Geesthachter Nabu. Er hat selbst Bienenstöcke auf dem Grundstück.
ref: Geesthacht. "Geesthacht in bloom" is the name of the campaign run by the Nature and Biodiversity Conservation Union in cooperation with the city administration. Since 2015, thousands of flower bulbs and plants have been planted with the assistance of numerous volunteers from volunteer associations, schools, daycare centers, businesses, and institutions. The goal: the creation of flower islands across large areas of Geesthacht's urban area to offer insects nourishment at all times. "When the weather is good, bees will emerge in search of food as early as January," says Friedhelm Ringe from the Nature and Biodiversity Conservation Union in Geesthacht. He personally has beehives on the property.
draft_translation: Geesthacht. "Geesthacht blooms" is an action of Nabu in cooperation with the city administration. With the participation of many volunteers from associations, schools, daycare centers, companies, and institutions, thousands of bulb seeds and plants have been planted in the earth since 2015. Goal: In the Geesthacht city area, large areas of flowering islands should be created, on which insects can find food at any time. "With favorable weather conditions, the bees already fly out in January to search for food," says Friedhelm Ringe from the Nabu of Geesthacht. He has his own beehives on the property.
final_translation: Geesthacht. "Geesthacht blooms" is an initiative of Nabu in cooperation with the city administration. With the participation of many volunteers from associations, schools, daycare centers, companies, and institutions, thousands of bulb plants and plants have been planted in the earth since 2015. Goal: In the Geesthacht city area, large areas of flowering islands should be created, on which insects can find food at any time. "With favorable weather conditions, the bees already fly out in January to search for food," says Friedhelm Ringe from the Nabu of Geesthacht. He has his own beehives on the property.

src: Damit das Unterfangen nicht nur eine Aktion von Naturschützern und dem Fachdienst Umwelt der Stadt bleibt, sondern bis in die privaten Gärten hinein weite Kreise zieht, werden immer wieder erklärende Tafeln zu den Pflanzen gestellt. Etwa 50 Schilder sind es bis jetzt. Passanten sollen sich auf diese Weise informieren können, was hier gerade so schön blüht. Die Hoffnung ist, dass Hobbygärtner zu Hause gezielt nachpflanzen.
ref: Explanatory plaques about the plants are put in place to ensure that the endeavor gains enough momentum to impact private gardens, instead of remaining a campaign limited to environmental activists and the municipal specialized environmental services. There are approximately 50 signs to date. This way, passers-by can learn about what beautiful plants are currently in bloom. The hope is for hobby gardeners to specifically plant them at home.
draft_translation: So that this endeavor is not just an action of environmentalists and the city's environmental department, but also reaches into private gardens, explanatory signs about the plants are placed repeatedly. There are now about 50 signs. Pedestrians should be able to inform themselves this way about what is currently blooming here. The hope is that hobby gardeners will specifically replant them at home.
final_translation: So that this endeavor is not just an action of environmentalists and the city's environmental department, but also extends into private gardens, explanatory signs about the plants are placed repeatedly. There are now about 50 signs. Pedestrians should be able to inform themselves this way about what is currently blooming here. The hope is that hobby gardeners will specifically replant them at home.

src: In der ersten Januarwoche war bereits Saisonstart bei der Wildhasel
ref: Common hazel already came into season in the first week of January
draft_translation: The season started at Wildhasel in the first week of January.
final_translation: The season start was at Wildhasel in the first week of January.

src: Jüngeren Datums sind Sträucher wie Winterduftheckenkirsche und Winterschneeball in den Beeten der Fußgängerzone. Sie stecken jetzt seit einem Jahr in der Erde der Kübel an der Bergedorer Straße, zeigen blätterlos gerade die ersten zarten Blüten in Weiß und Rosa und sind jüngst mit weiteren Schildern bedacht worden. "Die Winterduftheckenkirsche ist ein sehr breitbuschiger Strauch und kann zwischen zwei Meter hoch und drei Meter breit werden", ist dort unter weiteren Angaben etwa zum geeigneten Standort zu lesen.
ref: Recently, shrubs such as winter honeysuckle and arrowwood have been placed in the beds in the pedestrian zone. They have been in the soil of the containers found on Bergedorer Straße for the past year, and although they do not yet have leaves, the first delicate white and pink blossoms have appeared, and were recently furnished with a new sign. "The winter honeysuckle is a very broadly bushy shrub and may grow up to two meters tall and three meters wide," among other information, can be found on the sign, which has been put in a suitable location for reading.
draft_translation: Younger plants include winter-sweet hedge cherries and winter snowball in the flower beds of the pedestrian zone. They are now planted in the pots on Bergedorer Street for a year, showing their first delicate white and pink flowers without leaves, and have recently been marked with additional signs. "The winter-sweet hedge cherry is a very wide-spreading shrub and can grow up to two meters high and three meters wide," is stated there along with other information about the suitable location.
final_translation: Younger plants include winter-sweet hedge cherries and winter snowball in the flower beds of the pedestrian zone. They have been planted in the pots on Bergedorer Street for a year, showing their first delicate white and pink flowers without leaves, and have recently been marked with additional signs. "The winter-sweet hedge cherry is a very wide-spreading shrub and can grow up to two meters high and three meters wide," is stated there along with other information about the suitable location.

src: Friedhelm Ringe betont, dass aber nicht nur die Beetpflanzen nun Blüten zeigen. In der ersten Januarwoche war bereits Saisonstart bei der Wildhasel. Sie blüht besonders üppig am Richtweg bei der Steigung, in der Gutenbergstraße, Wilhelm-Holert-Straße, Fahrendofer Weg und vielen Knicks.
ref: Friedhelm Ringe emphasizes that not only the plants in the beds are now in bloom. Common hazel came into season during the first week of January. It is particularly abundantly in bloom on the steep hill on Richtweg, on Gutenbergstraße, Wilhelm-Holert-Straße, Fahrendofer Weg, and in numerous hedgerows.
draft_translation: Friedhelm Ringe emphasizes that not only the garden plants are now showing flowers. The first season start for the wild hazel was already in the first week of January. It blooms particularly abundantly along the Richtweg near the slope, in the Gutenbergstraße, Wilhelm-Holert-Straße, Fahrendofer Weg, and many bends.
final_translation: Friedhelm Ringe emphasizes that not only the garden plants are now showing flowers. The first season start for the wild hazel was already in the first week of January. It blooms particularly abundantly along the Richtweg near the slope, in the Gutenbergstraße, Wilhelm-Holert-Straße, Fahrendofer Weg, and many turns.

src: Ernestine ist 102 Jahre: "Steppen hält mich jung"
ref: Ernestine is 102 years old: "Tap dancing keeps me young"
draft_translation: Ernestine is 102 years old: "The steppes keep me young"
final_translation: Ernestine is 102 years old: "The steppes keep me young"

src: München - Tanz-Gott Fred Astaire wäre sicher stolz auf sie, wenn er vom Himmel runter zum Münchner Ostbahnhof schaut!
ref: Munich - Dance god Fred Astaire would certainly be proud of them if he could look down at the Munich East station from heaven!
draft_translation: Munich - Dance God Fred Astaire would be proud of them if he looked down from heaven at the Munich East Station!
final_translation: Munich - Dance God Fred Astaire would be proud of them if he looked down from heaven at the Munich East Station!

src: Immer montags treffen sich nämlich dort in der "Mandolin Motion Show Academy" um Punkt 15 Uhr drei Damen zum flotten Stepptanz - zusammen sind sie unglaubliche 277 Jahre alt, pardon jung!
ref: That is where three women meet for vigorous tap dancing at 3 pm on the dot at the "Mandolin Motion Show Academy" - unbelievably, their combined age is 277 years old, or should I say young!
draft_translation: Indeed, every Monday they meet there at the "Mandolin Motion Show Academy" at 3 p.m. for a lively step dance - together they are incredible 277 years old, pardon, young!

draft_translation: The oldest of them is Ernestine Stauchner, she recently celebrated her 102nd birthday.
final_translation: The oldest of them is Ernestine Stauchner, she recently celebrated her 102nd birthday.

src: Für die gebürtige Münchnerin (15. Januar 1921) von der Schwanthaler Höh" ist der Montag DER Höhepunkt der Woche. "Tanzen und Steppen ist mein Leben, ohne kann ich mir nicht vorstellen".
ref: Monday is THE highlight of the week for the native Munichite (15 January 1921) from Schwanthalerhöhe. "Dancing and tap dancing is my life, I can't imagine it without them."
draft_translation: The Monday is the highlight of the week for the born Munich woman (January 15, 1921) from the Schwanthaler Höh. "Dancing and stepping is my life, I can't imagine living without it."
final_translation: Monday is the highlight of the week for the Munich-born woman (January 15, 1921) from the Schwanthaler Höh. "Dancing and stepping is my life, I can't imagine living without it."

src: Mit Ernestine schwingen auch Eva-Maria Stolze (fast 97) und Elfriede Widmann (79) die Tanzbeine.
ref: Eva-Maria Stolze (almost 97) and Elfriede Widmann (79) also burn up the dance floor with Ernestine.
draft_translation: Even Ernestine, Eva-Maria Stolze (almost 97) and Elfriede Widmann (79) dance the dance.
final_translation: With Ernestine, Eva-Maria Stolze (almost 97) and Elfriede Widmann (79) dance.

src: Die 97-Jährige ist 1926 in Jena (Thüringen geborgen). Sie war eine Soubrette, heute würde man Musical-Darstellerin sagen, arbeitete mit der legendären Marika Rökk zusammen. "Mit Tanzen, Schauspielern und Singen hab ich mein Leben verbracht".
ref: The 97-year-old was born in Jena (Thuringia) in 1926. She was a soubrette, which we will call a musical actress today, and worked with the legendary Marika Rökk. "I spent my life dancing, acting, and singing."
draft_translation: The 97-year-old was born in Jena (Thuringia) in 1926. She was a Soubrette, today one would call her a musical performer, and she worked with the legendary Marika Rökk. 'I have spent my life dancing, acting, and singing,' she said."
final_translation: The 97-year-old was born in Jena (Thuringia) in 1926. She was a Soubrette, today one would call her a musical performer, and she worked with the legendary Marika Rökk. "I have spent my life dancing, acting, and singing," she said.

src: Mit ihren 79 Jahren ist Elfriede Widmann so etwas wie das Küken in der Runde der Stepptänzerinnen. Sie sagt: "Wir haben hier einfach Spaß mit unserer Tanzlehrerin Sissy Engl".
ref: At 79 years old, Elfriede Widmann is the spring chicken among these tap dancing women. "We simply have fun here with our dance teacher, Sissy Engl," she says.
draft_translation: At 79 years old, Elfriede Widmann is like the chick in the circle of the step dancers. She says: "We just have fun with our dance teacher Sissy Engl."
final_translation: At 79 years old, Elfriede Widmann is as the young one in the circle of step dancers. She says: "We just have fun with our dance teacher Sissy Engl."

src: Wikipedia: Der Stepptanz wurde im 19. Jahrhundert in den USA entwickelt und ist heute überall auf der Welt bekannt. Mit je zwei Metallplatten, die haltbarer sind als die zunächst benutzten Holzsohlen, vorne und hinten an den Schuhen angebracht, werden beim Tanzen rhythmische Klänge erzeugt, die zum optischen Eindruck und zur Musik passen. Der Tänzer wird somit auch zum Perkussions-Musiker. Der englische Ausdruck dafür ist lautmalerisch Tap dance und der französische Claquettes. Der spanische Flamenco könnte den Stepptanz beeinflusst haben. Dabei werden die Spitzen der Schuhe genagelt, damit sie beim Tanzen einen gut hörbaren Ton erzeugen.
ref: Wikipedia: Tap dancing was developed in the 19th century in the USA, and is now known all over the world. Rhythmic sounds that suit the visual impression and music are produced when dancing by attaching two metal plates to the front and back of the soles of both shoes, which are more durable than the original wooden soles. In this way, the dancer becomes a percussionist. The English term tap dance is onomatopoeic, and the French call it claquettes. The Spanish Flamenco may have influenced tap dance. During this dance, nails are driven through the tips of the shoes so that they produce an easily audible tone when dancing.
draft_translation: Wikipedia: Tap dance was developed in the United States in the 19th century and is now world-famous. With two metal plates, which are more durable than the initially used wooden soles, attached in front and behind the shoes, rhythmic sounds are produced during dancing that match the visual impression and the music. The dancer thus also becomes a percussion musician. The English term for this is lautmalerisch Tap dance, and the French term is Claquettes. The Spanish Flamenco could have influenced the tap dance. During the dance, the tips of the shoes are filed down so that they produce a clearly audible sound.
final_translation: Wikipedia: Tap dance was developed in the United States in the 19th century and is now world-famous. With two metal plates, which are more durable than the initially used wooden soles, attached in front and behind the shoes, rhythmic sounds are produced during dancing that match the visual impression and the music. The dancer thus also becomes a percussion musician. The English term for this is percussive Tap dance, and the French term is Claquettes. The Spanish Flamenco could have influenced the tap dance. During the dance, the tips of the shoes are tipped so that they produce a clearly audible sound.

src: Die 77-jährige Sissi Engl ist die gute Seele des Tanzstudios am Ostbahnhof. Sie ist Schauspielerin, Tänzerin und Choreografin. "Wir sind eine große Familie, bei uns sind groß und klein, Alt und Jung willkommen".
ref: The 77-year-old Sissi Engl is the heart and soul of the dance studio at the East station. She is an actress, dancer and choreographer. "We are one big family; we welcome big and small, old and young."
draft_translation: Sissi Engl, who is 77 years old, is the good soul of the dance studio at the East Station. She is an actress, dancer, and choreographer. "We are a big family, and everyone, young and old, is welcome here."
final_translation: Sissi Engl, 77, is the good spirit of the dance studio at East Station. She is an actress, dancer, and choreographer. "We are a big family, and everyone, young and old, is welcome here."

src: Und was ist das Rezept für ein so langes Leben? "Mich hält die Bewegung jung", sagt die 102-Jährige zu BILD. Ihr Rat an alle: "Sport, gesundes Essen und keinen Alkohol".
ref: So, what is the recipe for such a long life? "Exercise keeps me young," the 102-year-old says to BILD. Her advice to everyone: "working out, healthy food, and no alcohol."
draft_translation: And what is the recipe for such a long life? "Movement keeps me young," says the 102-year-old to BILD. Her advice to everyone: "Exercise, healthy eating, and no alcohol."

src: Analog im Dialog - Die Grenzen des Digitalen

src: Mit fortschreitender Digitalisierung wächst bei so manchen wieder die Lust auf analog
ref: As digitalization advances, some people are rediscovering their desire for analog
draft_translation: As digitalization progresses, there is a growing desire for analog in many people.
final_translation: As digitalization progresses, there is a growing desire for analog in many people.

src: Die Rasanz, mit der unser Alltag digital wurde, ließ uns kaum Zeit, Regeln für den Umgang damit aufzustellen und unsere Kommunikations- und Arbeitsweisen daran anzupassen, meint DNN-Kolumnistin Claudia Muntschick.
ref: The speed at which our everyday life is becoming digital does not allow us time to create rules for how to deal with it and adapt the way that we communicate and work, opines DNN columnist Claudia Muntschick.
draft_translation: The speed at which our daily lives have become digital left us little time to establish rules for dealing with it and to adjust our communication and work styles accordingly, says DNN columnist Claudia Muntschick.
final_translation: The speed at which our daily lives have become digital left us little time to establish rules for dealing with it and to adjust our communication and work styles accordingly, says DNN columnist Claudia Muntschick.

src: Dresden. Wenn man im Jahr 1985 in Bautzen ein Telefongespräch führen wollte, gab es drei Möglichkeiten. Entweder gehörte man zu den sechs Prozent der Glücklichen, die über einen privaten Anschluss verfügten. Oder man gehörte zu denen, die Jemanden aus dieser exklusiven Gruppe in der Nachbarschaft hatten und dort für eine Flasche Radeberger mit der Verwandtschaft telefonieren konnten. Oder man suchte eine Telefonzelle auf. Unvergessen der Geruch des Plastehörers und das Klicken der Kleingeldmünzen im Automaten. Mein größter Traum war es, beim Anrufen auch das Gesicht des Anderen sehen zu können - Bildtelefonie, dachte ich, was wäre das für eine tolle Sache!
ref: Dresden. In 1985, there were three options if you wanted to hold a telephone conversation in Bautzen. Either you belonged to the six percent of lucky people who had a private line. Otherwise, you knew someone from this exclusive group in your neighborhood and could phone relatives from their house in exchange for a bottle of Radeberger. Alternatively, you had to look for a telephone booth. The smell of the plastic receiver and the clicks as the change fell into the coin machine were unforgettable. It was my greatest dream to be able to see the face of the other person when calling - a visual telephone, how great would that be, I thought!
draft_translation: Dresden. If someone in 1985 in Bautzen wanted to have a phone call, there were three possibilities. Either you belonged to the six percent of the lucky people who had a private line. Or you belonged to those who had someone from this exclusive group in the neighborhood and could therefore call a friend for a bottle of Radeberger with the family. Or you looked for a payphone. Unforgettable was the smell of the plastic earpiece and the click of the small change coins in the machine. My greatest dream was to be able to see the other person's face during the call - video phone, I thought, what a great thing!
final_translation: Dresden. If someone in 1985 in Bautzen wanted to have a phone call, there were three possibilities. Either you belonged to the six percent of the lucky people who had a private line. Or you belonged to those who had someone from this exclusive group in the neighborhood and could therefore call the family for a bottle of Radeberger with someone from the group. Or you looked for a payphone. Unforgettable was the smell of the plastic earpiece and the click of the small change coins in the machine. My greatest dream was to be able to see the other person's face during the call - video calling, I thought, what a great thing!

src: Wie weiter in Moldau? 14 Tage für eine neue Regierung

src: In Moldau (auch: Moldawien) hat die Präsidentin Maia Sandu den ehemaligen Innenminister Dorin Recean mit der Regierungsbildung beauftragt.
ref: In Moldova (also: Moldavia), President Maia Sandu has tasked former Secretary of the Interior Dorin Recean with forming the government.
draft_translation: The president of Moldova (also: Moldavia), Maia Sandu, has tasked the former interior minister Dorin Recean with forming the government.
final_translation: The president of Moldova (also: Moldavia), Maia Sandu, has tasked the former interior minister Dorin Recean with forming the government.

src: Dafür hat der 48-Jährige Wirtschaftsexperte jetzt 14 Tage Zeit. Bisher war Recean einer der Berater der Präsidentin.
ref: The 48-year-old economist now has 14 days to do so. Recean was previously one of the president's advisers.
draft_translation: The 48-year-old economics expert now has 14 days. So far, Recean was one of the president's advisors.

src: Nach nur anderthalb Jahren im Amt war Ministerpräsidentin Natalia Gavrilita überraschend zurückgetreten. Die pro-europäische Regierungschefin stand unter massivem Druck., wie sie selbst als Erklärung für ihre Demission bekannt gab - offenbar wurde sie von pro-russischen Kräften angefeindet.
ref: After just one and a half years in office, Prime Minister Natalia Gavralita surprisingly resigned. The head of the pro-European government was under extreme pressure, which was the explanation she gave publicly for her resignation - she was apparently treated with hostility by pro-Russian forces.
draft_translation: The minister-president Natalia Gavrilita unexpectedly resigned after just over a year in office. The pro-European government leader was under significant pressure, as she herself explained for her resignation - apparently she was attacked by pro-Russian forces.
final_translation: The prime minister Natalia Gavrilita unexpectedly resigned after just over a year in office. The pro-European government leader was under significant pressure, as she herself explained for her resignation—apparently targeted by pro-Russian forces.

src: Die Präsidentin dankte Gavrilita für deren "enorme Opfer".
ref: The president thanked Gavralita for her "enormous sacrifice."
draft_translation: The President thanked Gavrilita for their "enormous sacrifice".
final_translation: The President thanked Gavrilita for her "enormous sacrifice".

src: Moldau ist Nachbarland der Ukraine und leidet unter den wirtschaftlichen Folgen des Krieges. Die Inflation liegt bei über 40 Prozent und die kleine Republik hat Zehntausende Geflüchtete aus der Ukraine aufgenommen.
ref: Moldova is a neighboring country of the Ukraine, and is suffering from the economic consequences of the war. Inflation has risen to above 40 percent, and the small republic has taken in tens of thousands of refugees from the Ukraine.
draft_translation: Moldova is a neighboring country of Ukraine and suffers from the economic consequences of the war. The inflation rate is over 40 percent, and the small republic has taken in tens of thousands of refugees from Ukraine.
final_translation: Moldova is a neighboring country of Ukraine and suffers from the economic consequences of the war. The inflation rate is over 40 percent, and the small republic has taken in tens of thousands of refugees from Ukraine.

src: Im Parlament in Chisinau hat die von Präsidentin Sandu gegründete pro-europäische Partei PAS (Partei der Aktion und Solidarität) eine komfortable Mehrheit, denn sie besetzt 63 von 101 Sitzen. Die Bestätigung des neuen Regierungschefs und seines Kabinetts dürfte von daher kein Problem darstellen.
ref: The pro-European party PAS (Party of Action and Solidarity) founded by President Sandu has a comfortable majority in the parliament in Chisinau, since it holds 63 of 101 seats. The confirmation of the new head of government and his cabinet should therefore not be a problem.
draft_translation: The pro-European Party PAS (Party of Action and Solidarity), founded by President Sandu, has a comfortable majority in the Parliament in Chisinau, as it holds 63 out of 101 seats. The confirmation of the new prime minister and his cabinet therefore should not pose any problem.
final_translation: The pro-European Party PAS (Party of Action and Solidarity), founded by President Sandu, has a comfortable majority in the Parliament in Chisinau, as it holds 63 out of 101 seats. The confirmation of the new prime minister and his cabinet therefore should not pose any problem.

src: Allerdings haben die pro-europäischen Politikerinnen und Politiker in den vergangenen Monaten in Moldau an Popularität verloren, während die pro-russischen - mit Unterstützung aus dem Kreml - beliebter geworden sind.
ref: However, pro-European politicians in Moldova have lost popularity in recent months, while the pro-Russian politicians - with support from the Kremlin - have become more popular.
draft_translation: However, pro-European politicians in Moldova have lost popularity in the past few months, while pro-Russian politicians - with support from the Kremlin - have become more popular.
final_translation: However, pro-European politicians in Moldova have lost popularity in the past few months, while pro-Russian politicians - with support from the Kremlin - have become more popular.

src: Oberhof: Kühn Achter im WM-Sprint
