src: Die geschlagene Topfavoritin Sofia Goggia hat sich nach ihrem Aus in der Abfahrt der alpinen Ski-Weltmeisterschaften schwer enttäuscht gezeigt.
ref: The defeated favorite Sofia Goggia appeared extremely disappointed after she was disqualified during the downhill in the Alpine World Ski Championships.
draft_translation: Sofia Goggia, the fallen favorite in the alpine skiing world championships, has shown great disappointment after her exit in the slalom.
final_translation: Sofia Goggia, the defeated favorite in the alpine skiing world championships, has shown great disappointment after her loss in the downhill.

src: Méribel
ref: Méribel
draft_translation: Méribel
final_translation: Méribel

src: "Ich bin traurig, weil ich nicht die Leistung gebracht habe, die ich kann", sagte die Italienerin im ZDF, nachdem sie an einem Tor eingefädelt hatte und ausgeschieden war. Immerhin konnte die 30-Jährige einen womöglich schweren Sturz gerade noch verhindern.
ref: "I'm sad, because I was not able to bring my A-game," the Italian told ZDF after she straddled one of the gates and was disqualified. At least the 30-year-old was able to narrowly avoid a potentially serious fall.
draft_translation: The Italian woman said on ZDF, "I am sad because I didn't achieve the performance I am capable of," after she was sent off for a foul and was eliminated. Nevertheless, the 30-year-old managed to just avoid a potentially serious fall.
final_translation: The Italian woman said on ZDF, "I am sad because I didn't achieve the performance I am capable of," after she was sent off for a foul and was eliminated. Nevertheless, the 30-year-old managed to just avoid a potentially serious fall.

src: Goggia ist seit Jahren die dominierende Abfahrerin im Weltcup. Vier der bisherigen sechs Saisonrennen in dieser Disziplin hat sie gewonnen. Nach Gold 2018 in Pyeongchang holte sie bei den Olympischen Winterspielen 2022 in Peking Silber. Auf eine WM-Medaille in ihrer Paradedisziplin muss Goggia, die für ihre riskante Fahrweise bekannt ist, aber weiter warten. Bei ihrem Heimspiel in Cortina d'Ampezzo vor zwei Jahren fehlte sie verletzungsbedingt.
ref: Goggia has been the dominant downhill athlete during the World Championships. She has won four of the six races of the season to date in this discipline. After being awarded a gold medal in Pyeongchang in 2018, she was awarded silver during the 2022 Winter Olympic Games in Beijing. Goggia, who is known for her risky maneuvres, will have to wait for a World Championship medal in her specialty event. She was absent from the event on her home turf at Cortina d'Ampezzo two years ago due to injury.
draft_translation: Goggia has been the dominant slalom skier in the World Cup for years. She has won four of the six races so far in this discipline. After winning gold in Pyeongchang in 2018, she took silver at the Winter Olympics in Beijing in 2022. Goggia, who is known for her risky riding style, still has to wait for a World Championship medal in her signature discipline. Two years ago, at her home event in Cortina d'Ampezzo, she was unable to compete due to an injury.
final_translation: Goggia has been the dominant slalom skier in the World Cup for years. She has won four of the six races so far in this discipline. After winning gold in Pyeongchang in 2018, she took silver at the Winter Olympics in Beijing 2022. Goggia, who is known for her risky riding style, still has to wait for a World Championship medal in her parade discipline. Two years ago, at her home event in Cortina d'Ampezzo, she was unable to compete due to an injury.

src: "Ich habe eigentlich gedacht, ich wäre gut drauf. Es ging um Hundertstelsekunden", sagte Goggia nach dem überraschenden Sieg der Schweizerin Jasmine Flury im französischen Méribel nun. "Ich bin enttäuscht. Ich habe alles gegeben. Aber so ist das Leben". Manchmal glaube man, Dinge seien garantiert, sagte sie über die von allen Experten erwartete und letztlich verpasste Medaille: "Sind sie aber nicht".
ref: "I actually thought I was doing fine. We are talking about hundredths of a second," Goggia said after the surprising victory by the Swiss Jasmine Flury in France's Méribel. "I'm disappointed. I gave my all. But that is life." Sometimes I believe that things are certain, she said about the medal that all experts expected her to win, but did not: "But they aren't."
draft_translation: "I actually thought I was in good shape. It was about hundredths of a second," said Goggia after the surprising win of the Swiss Jasmine Flury in Méribel, France. "I'm disappointed. I gave everything. But that's life." Sometimes you think things are guaranteed," she said about the medal that was expected by everyone and ultimately missed: "But they aren't."
final_translation: "I actually thought I was in good form. It was hundredths of a second," said Goggia after the surprising win of the Swiss Jasmine Flury in Méribel, France. "I'm disappointed. I gave everything. But that's life." Sometimes you think things are guaranteed," she said about the medal that was expected by everyone and ultimately missed: "But they aren't."

src: Viktoriya Stankovych wurde zuletzt am Freitag am S-Bahnhof Waidmannslust gesehen. Die Polizei bittet um Hinweise zu ihrem Verbleib.
ref: Viktoriya Stankovych was last seen on Friday at the Waidmannslust regional train station. Police are asking for information on her whereabouts.
draft_translation: Viktoriya Stankovych was last seen on Friday at the S-Bahnhof Waidmannslust. The police are asking for information about her whereabouts.
final_translation: Viktoriya Stankovych was last seen on Friday at the S-Bahnhof Waidmannslust. The police are asking for information about her whereabouts.

src: Berlin. Mit der Veröffentlichung eines Fotos bittet die Polizei Berlin die Bevölkerung um Mithilfe bei der Suche nach einem vermissten Kind. Die 12-jährige Viktoriya Stankovych soll am 10. Februar 2023 gegen 12.30 Uhr das Gelände ihrer Schule gemeinsam mit anderen Kindern in Richtung des S-Bahnhofs Waidmannslust verlassen haben. Dort am S-Bahnhof wurde sie zuletzt gesehen. Das Kind ist seit April 2022 als Geflüchtete in Berlin und hat nur sehr geringe deutsche Sprach- und Ortskenntnisse.
ref: Berlin. The Berlin police are requesting assistance from the local population in the search for a missing child by publishing a photo. Viktoriya Stankovych, who is 12 years old, is said to have left the school premises with other children on February 10th, 2023, at 12:30 heading for the Waidmannslust regional train station. She was last seen at the regional train station. She arrived in Berlin as a refugee in April 2022, and does not speak much German or know her way around.
draft_translation: Berlin. By publishing a photo, the Berlin police are asking the public for help in searching for a missing child. The 12-year-old Viktoriya Stankovych was seen leaving the grounds of her school together with other children towards the S-Bahnhof Waidmannslust on February 10, 2023, around 12:30 PM. She was last seen at the S-Bahnhof. The child has been in Berlin as a refugee since April 2022 and has only very limited knowledge of the German language and the local area.
final_translation: Berlin. By publishing a photo, the Berlin police are asking the public for help in searching for a missing child. The 12-year-old Viktoriya Stankovych was seen leaving the grounds of her school together with other children towards the S-Bahnhof Waidmannslust on February 10, 2023, around 12:30 PM. She was last seen at the S-Bahnhof. The child has been in Berlin as a refugee since April 2022 and has only very limited knowledge of the German language and the local area.

final_translation: The tips are received by the Criminal Police of Police District 1 (North) under the phone number (030) 4664 - 171 100 or any other police department.

src: Selenskyj und Minister gegen Russlands Olympia-Teilnahme
ref: Zelensky and his ministers oppose Russian participation in the Olympics
draft_translation: Selenskyj and Minister Against Russia's Participation in the Olympics
final_translation: Selenskyj and Minister Oppose Russia's Participation in the Olympics

src: Kiew. Mit der Forderung nach Ausschluss von russischen und belarussischen Sportlern von den Olympischen Spielen 2024 in Paris haben Sportpolitiker aus 35 Nationen den Druck auf das Internationale Olympische Komitee (IOC) erhöht.
ref: Kyiv. Ministers of Sports from 35 countries have increased pressure on the International Olympic Committee (IOC) by demanding the exclusion of Russian and Belarusian athletes from the 2024 Olympic Games in Paris.
draft_translation: Kiew. With the demand to exclude Russian and Belarussian athletes from the Olympic Games 2024 in Paris, sports politicians from 35 nations have increased pressure on the International Olympic Committee (IOC).
final_translation: Kiew. With the demand to exclude Russian and Belarussian athletes from the Olympic Games 2024 in Paris, sports politicians from 35 nations have increased pressure on the International Olympic Committee (IOC).

src: Man habe auf einer gemeinsamen Telefonkonferenz vereinbart, eine Erklärung zu verfassen, um Versuche zu verhindern, Sportler aus Russland und Belarus zu internationalen Sportwettkämpfen zurückzuschicken, teilte das litauische Sportministerium auf seiner Internetseite mit.
ref: It was agreed in a joint telephone conference call that a statement would be drafted to prevent attempts to send athletes from Russia and Belarus to international competitions, the Lithuanian Sports Ministry stated on its website.
draft_translation: The ministry of sports of Lithuania stated on its website that during a joint telephone conference, it was agreed to draft a statement to prevent attempts to send athletes from Russia and Belarus back to international sports events.
final_translation: The ministry of sports of Lithuania stated on its website that during a joint telephone conference, it was agreed to draft a statement to prevent attempts to send athletes from Russia and Belarus back to international sports competitions.

src: "Wir fordern den Ausschluss russischer und belarussischer Sportler von allen internationalen Wettbewerben, einschließlich der Olympischen Spiele, solange der Krieg in der Ukraine andauert", sagte Ministerin Jurgita Šiugždinienė.
ref: "We demand the exclusion of Russian and Belarusian athletes from all international competitions, including the Olympic Games, while the war in the Ukraine is ongoing," said Minister Jurgita Šiugždinienė.
draft_translation: The minister, Jurgita Šiugždinienė, said: "We demand the exclusion of Russian and Belarussian athletes from all international competitions, including the Olympic Games, as long as the war in Ukraine continues."
final_translation: The Ministerin, Jurgita Šiugždinienė, said: "We demand the exclusion of Russian and Belarussian athletes from all international competitions, including the Olympic Games, as long as the war in Ukraine continues."

src: Die Video-Beratung hatte auf Initiative von Großbritannien stattgefunden. Es sei ein sehr produktives Treffen gewesen, schrieb die britische Sportministerin Lucy Frazer auf Twitter. "Und ich habe die Position Großbritanniens sehr deutlich gemacht: Solange Putin seinen barbarischen Krieg fortsetzt, dürfen Russland und Belarus nicht bei den Olympischen Spielen vertreten sein. Wir werden nun eine gemeinsame Erklärung zu diesem Thema abgeben".
ref: The video consultation was initiated by Great Britain. British Minister of Sport Lucy Frazer, wrote on Twitter that it was a very productive meeting. "And I made Great Britain's position very clear: As long as Put continues his barbaric war, Russia and Belarus may not be represented in the Olympic Games. We will now issue a joint declaration on this topic."
draft_translation: The video conference took place at the initiative of the United Kingdom. "It was a very productive meeting," wrote British Sports Minister Lucy Frazer on Twitter. "And I clearly expressed the position of the United Kingdom: As long as Putin continues his barbaric war, Russia and Belarus must not be represented at the Olympic Games. We will now issue a joint statement on this issue."
final_translation: The video conference took place at the initiative of the United Kingdom. "It was a very productive meeting," wrote British Sports Minister Lucy Frazer on Twitter. "And I clearly expressed the position of the United Kingdom: As long as Putin continues his barbaric war, Russia and Belarus must not be represented at the Olympic Games. We will now issue a joint statement on this issue."

src: Zuvor hatte der ukrainische Präsident Wolodymyr Selenskyj bei einer internationalen Video-Konferenz von Sportministern und anderen ranghohen Vertretern gegen die Teilnahme von Athleten aus Russland und Belarus an internationalen Wettkämpfen protestiert. "Während Russland tötet und terrorisiert, haben Vertreter dieses Terrorstaates keinen Platz bei Sport- und olympischen Wettkämpfen", sagte Selenskyj. Er veröffentlichte seine Rede in seinem Telegram-Kanal. Wegen des russischen Angriffskrieges sei letztlich auch eine neutrale Flagge mit Blut getränkt und nicht tragbar.
ref: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy previously protested against the participation of Russian and Belarusian athletes in international competitions during an international video conference of Ministers of Sports. "While Russia continues to kill and terrorize, representatives of this terrorist state have no place in sporting and Olympic competitions," said Zelenskyy. He published his speech in his Telegram channel. He said that recently even the neutral flag has been soaked in blood and cannot be carried due to the Russian war of aggression.
draft_translation: Previously, the Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky had protested against the participation of athletes from Russia and Belarus in international competitions during an international video conference of sport ministers and other high-ranking representatives. "While Russia kills and terrorizes, representatives of this terrorist state have no place at sports and Olympic competitions," said Zelensky. He published his speech in his Telegram channel. Due to the Russian aggression war, the neutral flag has ultimately been stained with blood and is no longer wearable.
final_translation: Previously, the Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky had protested against the participation of athletes from Russia and Belarus in international competitions during an international video conference of sport ministers and other high-ranking representatives. "While Russia kills and terrorizes, representatives of this terrorist state have no place at sports and Olympic competitions," said Zelensky. He published his speech in his Telegram channel. Due to the Russian aggression war, the neutral flag has ultimately been stained with blood and is no longer wearable.

src: Ukraine droht mit Boykott
ref: Ukraine is threatening a boycott
draft_translation: Ukraine threatens a boycott
final_translation: Ukraine threatens a boycott

src: Die Ukraine sieht Belarus ebenfalls als Kriegspartei, weil das Land den russischen Truppen Militärbasen für Angriffe zur Verfügung stellt. Selenskyj rief die Funktionäre auf, sich für den Schutz der olympischen Prinzipien einzusetzen und eine Zulassung von russischen Sportlerinnen und Sportlern zu den Wettbewerben zu verhindern. Der Präsident erneuerte zudem seine Kritik am Internationalen Olympischen Komitee (IOC), das seine "Ehrlichkeit leider verloren hat".
ref: Ukraine also considers Belarus as an aggressor, since the country makes military bases available to Russian troops for attacks. Zelenskyy called on officials to work to protect the Olympic principles and prevent the admission of Russian athletes to competitions. The president also repeated his criticism of the International Olympic Committee (IOC), stating that it had "unfortunately lost integrity."
draft_translation: The Ukraine also considers Belarus a party to the war because the country provides military bases to Russian troops for attacks. Selenskyj called on the officials to support the protection of Olympic principles and to prevent the admission of Russian athletes and athletes to the competitions. The President also renewed his criticism of the International Olympic Committee (IOC), which he says has lost its "integrity."
final_translation: The Ukraine also considers Belarus a party to the war because the country provides military bases to Russian troops for attacks. Selenskij called on the officials to advocate for the protection of Olympic principles and to prevent the admission of Russian female athletes and athletes to the competitions. The President also renewed his criticism of the International Olympic Committee (IOC), which he says has lost its "integrity."

src: Anlass der Konferenz war die Ankündigung des IOC, Athleten aus Russland und Belarus die Teilnahme an internationalen Wettkämpfen unter bestimmten Voraussetzungen ermöglichen zu wollen. Die Ukraine droht auch mit einem Boykott, sollte das IOC die Sportler zulassen.
ref: The reason for the conference was that the IOC announced that it wanted to allow Russian and Belarusian athletes in international competitions under certain conditions. Ukraine also threatened to boycott if the IOC allows the athletes to compete.
draft_translation: The purpose of the conference was to announce the IOC's decision to allow athletes from Russia and Belarus to participate in international competitions under certain conditions. The Ukraine also threatens to boycott if the IOC allows the athletes.
final_translation: The purpose of the conference was to announce the IOC's decision to allow athletes from Russia and Belarus to participate in international competitions under certain conditions. The Ukraine also threatens to boycott if the IOC allows the athletes.

src: Auch Bundesinnenministerium bezieht Stellung
ref: The German Ministry of the Interior also took a stand
draft_translation: The Federal Ministry of the Interior also comments on it
final_translation: The Federal Ministry of the Interior also takes a position on it

src: Das für Sport zuständige Bundesinnenministerium erklärte im Anschluss, auch bei den Beratungen bekräftigt zu haben, einen Start russischer und belarussischer Sportler in Paris abzulehnen. "Es gibt aus unserer Sicht keinen Anlass, den russischen und belarussischen Sport zur Rückkehr in die Wettkämpfe einzuladen. Den ukrainischen Athletinnen und Athleten muss weiterhin die uneingeschränkte Solidarität und Unterstützung der internationalen Sportgemeinschaft gelten. Die Bestrebung des IOC zur Wiederaufnahme der russischen und belarussischen Athletinnen und Athleten ist der falsche Weg", teilte ein Sprecher des Innenministeriums auf dpa-Anfrage mit.
ref: The German Ministry of the Interior, which is responsible for sport, followed this up by explaining that it also affirmed the rejection of the participation of Russian and Belarusian athletes in Paris. "From our perspective, there is no reason to invite Russian and Belarusian sports to return to competition. The unconditional solidarity and support of the international sporting community must apply to the Ukrainian athletes. The efforts of the IOC to once again include Russian and Belarusian athletes is the wrong way to go about it," shared a speaker for the Ministry of the Interior when asked by the dpa.
draft_translation: The federal ministry responsible for sports stated following the statement, that it had reaffirmed during the consultations to reject the participation of Russian and Belarusian athletes in Paris. "From our perspective, there is no reason to invite Russian and Belarusian athletes back into competition. The international sports community must continue to show unconditional solidarity and support for Ukrainian athletes. The IOC's attempt to resume the participation of Russian and Belarusian athletes is the wrong path," a spokesperson of the ministry said in response to a dpa request.
final_translation: The federal ministry responsible for sports stated following the statement that it had reaffirmed during consultations to reject the participation of Russian and Belarusian athletes in Paris. "From our perspective, there is no reason to invite Russian and Belarusian athletes back into competition. The international sports community must continue to show unconditional solidarity and support for Ukrainian athletes. The IOC's attempt to resume the participation of Russian and Belarusian athletes is the wrong path," a spokesperson of the ministry said in response to a dpa request.

src: Innenministerin Nancy Faeser (SPD) hatte bereits Ende Januar betont: "Der Sport sollte in seiner Verurteilung des brutalen Krieges, den Putin gegen die ukrainische Zivilbevölkerung führt, klar sein. Große Sportereignisse finden nicht im luftleeren Raum statt". Russland hingegen betont, dass Sport und Politik getrennt werden müssten.
ref: Minister of the Interior Nancy Faeser (SPD) had already emphasized the following in late January: "Sports should be clear about their condemnation of the brutal war that Putin is carrying out against the Ukrainian civilian population. Large sporting events do not take place in a vacuum." Russia, on the other hand, emphasizes that sports and politics should be separate.
draft_translation: Minister of the Interior Nancy Faeser (SPD) had already emphasized by the end of January: "Sport should clearly condemn the brutal war that Putin leads against the Ukrainian civilian population. Major sporting events do not take place in a vacuum." Russia, on the other hand, emphasizes that sports and politics must remain separate.
final_translation: Minister of the Interior Nancy Faeser (SPD) had already stressed by the end of January: "Sport should clearly condemn the brutal war that Putin leads against the Ukrainian civilian population. Large sporting events do not take place in a vacuum." Russia, on the other hand, stresses that sports and politics must be kept separate.

src: Derzeit sind Russland und Belarus von vielen internationalen Sportwettbewerben ausgeschlossen. Das IOC strebt aber eine Rückkehr von Athletinnen und Athleten aus beiden Ländern auf die internationale Sportbühne unter neutraler Flagge an, sofern sie sich klar zur olympischen Charta bekennen und den Krieg in der Ukraine nicht aktiv unterstützen. IOC-Präsident Thomas Bach hatte jüngst erklärt, ein Ausschluss "wegen eines Passes oder des Geburtsorts" verstoße gegen das Diskriminierungsverbot.
ref: Russia and Belarus are currently excluded from many international sporting competitions. However, the IOC is campaigning for a return of the athletes from these two countries to the international sporting stage under a neutral flag, provided that they clearly acknowledge the Olympic charter and do not actively support the war in Ukraine. IOC President Thomas Bach recently declared that exclusion "due to a passport or place of birth" violates the ban on discrimination.
draft_translation: Russia and Belarus are currently excluded from many international sports events. However, the IOC aims to have athletes from both countries return to the international sports stage under a neutral flag, provided they clearly commit to the Olympic Charter and do not actively support the war in Ukraine. IOC President Thomas Bach recently stated that an exclusion "due to a passport or place of birth" would violate the prohibition on discrimination.
final_translation: Russia and Belarus are currently excluded from many international sports events. However, the IOC aims to have athletes from both countries return to the international sports stage under a neutral flag, provided they clearly commit to the Olympic Charter and do not actively support the war in Ukraine. IOC President Thomas Bach recently stated that an exclusion "due to a passport or place of birth" would violate the prohibition on discrimination.

src: Dort ankreiden, wo es passiert
ref: Assign blame where it happens
draft_translation: Scold there where it happens
final_translation: Scold where it happens

src: "Hey, geiler Hintern!", der Närrin im knappen sexy Kostüm hinterherpfeifen und anzügliche Sprüche rufen: All das fällt unter den Begriff des "Catcalling" (dt. Katzenrufe). Hinter dem Begriff verbirgt sich nicht geringeres als eine Form der verbalen sexuellen Belästigung im öffentlichen Raum.
ref: "Hey, sexy butt!" whistling at the female jester in a short, sexy costume and making suggestive remarks: All of this falls under the term "catcalling" (i.e. catcalling). Nothing less than a form of public, verbal, sexual harassment is hiding behind this term.
draft_translation: "Hey, geiler Hintern!" – the joker in the tight, sexy costume whistles after him and shouts suggestive remarks: All of this falls under the term "Catcalling" (German: Katzenrufe). Behind the term lies nothing less than a form of verbal sexual harassment in public space.

src: Hälfte der Fahrzeuge verloren? : USA sehen Moskaus Panzerbestand stark dezimiert
ref: Half of the vehicles have been lost? : USA sees that Moscow's tank inventory has been starkly reduced
draft_translation: Half of the vehicles lost? : The USA see Moscow's tank stock strongly depleted
final_translation: Half of the vehicles lost? : The USA report Moscow's tank stock strongly depleted

src: Hälfte der Fahrzeuge verloren? USA sehen Moskaus Panzerbestand stark dezimiert
ref: Half of the vehicles have been lost? USA sees that Moscow's tank inventory has been starkly reduced
draft_translation: Half of the vehicles lost? The USA see Moscow's tank stock heavily depleted
final_translation: Half of the vehicles lost? The USA observe Moscow's tank inventory heavily depleted

src: Das Pentagon geht davon aus, dass Russland seit Kriegsbeginn eine erhebliche Anzahl von Panzern in der Ukraine verloren hat. Die Rede ist von der "Hälfte des Hauptbestands".
ref: The Pentagon assumes that Russia has lost a significant number of tanks in Ukraine since the start of the war. It is said to be "half of the main inventory."
draft_translation: The Pentagon assumes that Russia has lost a significant number of tanks in Ukraine since the war began. It is said to be "half of the main stockpile."
final_translation: The Pentagon assumes that Russia has lost a significant number of tanks in Ukraine since the war began. It is said to be "half of the main stock."

src: Die russische Armee hat bei ihrem Angriffskrieg gegen die Ukraine nach Schätzungen des US-Verteidigungsministeriums bereits die Hälfte ihrer Kampfpanzer verloren. "Vermutlich die Hälfte des Hauptbestands an Panzern" der russischen Armee sei "von der Ukraine zerstört oder beschlagnahmt" worden, sagte Celeste Wallander, Staatssekretärin für Internationale Sicherheitsfragen im US-Verteidigungsministerium.
ref: The Russian Army has already lost half of its main battle tanks in its war of aggression against Ukraine, according to estimates by the U.S. Defense Department. "Probably half of the Russian Army's inventory of main battle tanks" has been "destroyed or seized by Ukraine," said Celeste Wallander, U.S. Department of Defense Undersecretary for International Security Affairs.
draft_translation: The Russian army has already lost half of its combat tanks in its invasion war against Ukraine, according to estimates by the US Department of Defense. "Probably half of the Russian army's main tank stockpile" has been "destroyed or seized" by Ukraine," said Celeste Wallander, Under Secretary for International Security Affairs at the US Department of Defense.
final_translation: The Russian army has already lost half of its combat tanks in its offensive against Ukraine, according to estimates by the US Department of Defense. "Probably half of the Russian army's primary tank stockpile" has been "destroyed or seized" by Ukraine," said Celeste Wallander, Under Secretary for International Security Affairs at the US Department of Defense.

src: Wallander machte bei einer Online-Veranstaltung der Denkfabrik Center for a New American Security keine weiteren Angaben zur Zahl der nach US-Einschätzung beschlagnahmten und zerstörten Panzer.
ref: Wallander gave no further details on the number of tanks that have been captured and destroyed, according to the U.S. estimate, during an online event held by the think tank Center for a New American Security.
draft_translation: Wallander gave no further details at an online event of the Denkfabrik Center for a New American Security regarding the number of tanks that, according to the US assessment, had been seized and destroyed.
final_translation: Wallander gave no further details at an online event of the Denkfabrik Center for a New American Security regarding the number of tanks that, according to the US assessment, had been seized and destroyed.

src: Die Ukraine soll in den kommenden Wochen von mehreren westlichen Verbündeten Kampfpanzer erhalten. Großbritannien hat Kiew die Lieferung von Challenger-2-Kampfpanzern für März zugesagt. Deutschland will in einer Koalition mit anderen Staaten bis April ein Bataillon an Leopard-2-Panzern in die Ukraine liefern. Die USA haben ebenfalls ein Bataillon aus 31 Kampfpanzer vom Typ Abrams zugesagt. Ihre Lieferung dauert jedoch aller Voraussicht nach wesentlich länger.
ref: Ukraine will receive battle tanks from multiple Western allies in the coming weeks. Great Britain agreed to deliver Challenger 2 battle tanks to Kyiv in March. Germany will deliver a battalion of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine by April in coalition with other states. The USA has also agreed to deliver a battalion of 31 Abrams battle tanks. However, their delivery is most likely to take significantly longer.
draft_translation: The Ukraine is expected to receive several Western allies' combat tanks in the coming weeks. Britain has pledged to deliver Challenger-2 tanks to Kyiv in March. Germany plans to deliver a battalion of Leopard-2 tanks to Ukraine in a coalition with other countries by April. The United States have also pledged to deliver a battalion of 31 Abrams tanks. However, their delivery is expected to take significantly longer.
final_translation: The Ukraine is expected to receive several Western allies' combat tanks in the coming weeks. Britain has pledged to deliver Challenger-2 tanks to Kyiv in March. Germany plans to deliver a battalion of Leopard-2 tanks to Ukraine in a coalition with other countries by April. The United States has also pledged to deliver a battalion of 31 Abrams tanks. However, their delivery is expected to take significantly longer.

src: Russland will Nachlegen
ref: Russia wants to ramp things up
draft_translation: Russia wants to take the lead
final_translation: Russia wants to take the lead

src: Als Reaktion auf die westlichen Militärhilfen stellte Ex-Kremlchef Dmitri Medwedew den Bau und die Modernisierung von Tausenden Panzern in Aussicht. "Wie wir wissen, hat unser Feind im Ausland um Flugzeuge, Raketen, Panzer gebettelt", sagte Medwedew, der mittlerweile Vize-Chef des russischen Sicherheitsrats ist, bei einem Besuch einer Panzerfabrik in der sibirischen Stadt Omsk. "Es ist klar, dass es für uns in diesem Fall selbstverständlich ist, die Produktion verschiedener Waffenarten und Militärtechnik - einschließlich moderner Panzer - zu steigern".
ref: In response to Western military aid, former Kremlin leader Dmitry Medvedev held out the prospect of constructing and modernizing thousands of tanks . "As we know, our foreign enemy begged for airplanes, rockets, tanks," said Medvedev, who is now the deputy leader of the Russian Security Council, during a visit to a tank factory in the Siberian city of Omsk. "It is obvious that, in such a case, we will increase the production of various types of weapons and military technology - including modern tanks."
draft_translation: In response to Western military aid, former Kremlin chief Dmitry Medvedev outlined the construction and modernization of thousands of tanks. "As we know, our enemy abroad has begged for planes, rockets, and tanks," said Medvedev, who is now deputy head of the Russian Security Council, during a visit to a tank factory in the Siberian city of Omsk. "It is clear that for us, in this case, it is natural to increase the production of various types of weapons and military equipment, including modern tanks."

src: Bereits seit dem vergangenen Sommer ist in Russland ein Gesetz in Kraft, das eine stärkere Ausrichtung der Wirtschaft auf Bedürfnisse der Armee ermöglicht. Damit können etwa einzelne Branchen zur Belieferung der Streitkräfte verpflichtet werden.
ref: Since last summer, a law has already been in effect in Russia to facilitate more intensive orientation of the economy to the needs of the army. With this, certain individual sectors may be obliged to deliver to the armed forces.
draft_translation: A law has been in effect in Russia since last summer that allows the economy to be more oriented towards the needs of the military. This means that certain industries can be compelled to supply the armed forces.
final_translation: A law has been in effect in Russia since last summer that allows the economy to be more oriented towards the needs of the military. This means that certain industries can be compelled to supply the armed forces.

src: Wirbel um Postenbesetzung bei Heer
ref: Fuss over the appointment to a military position
draft_translation: Winds around post vacancies in the army
final_translation: Turmoil over vacant positions in the army

src: Denn der Posten, den künftig der frühere Direktor des Heeresgeschichtlichen Museums (HGM) Christian Ortner bekleiden wird, war nicht ausgeschrieben. Der Personalvertreter der Akademie Herwig Jedlaucnik vermutet Postenkorruption und Amtsmissbrauch. Verteidigungsministerin Klaudia Tanner (ÖVP) verteidigt das Vorgehen.
ref: This is because the post, which would have been occupied by the former Military History Museum (MHM) Director Christian Ortner, was not advertised. The academy's staff representative, Herwig Jedlaucnik, suspects post corruption and abuse of office. Minister of Defense Klaudia Tanner (Austrian People's Party) defended the approach.
draft_translation: The position that the former director of the Army History Museum (HGM), Christian Ortner, will take up in the future was not publicly advertised. Academy employee representative Herwig Jedlaucnik suspects position corruption and abuse of office. Defense Minister Klaudia Tanner (ÖVP) defends the actions taken.
final_translation: The position that the former director of the Army History Museum (HGM), Christian Ortner, will take up in the future was not publicly advertised. Academy employee representative Herwig Jedlaucnik suspects position corruption and abuse of office. Defense Minister Klaudia Tanner (ÖVP) defends the proceedings.

src: Eine Ausschreibung sei nicht erforderlich, weil die Ernennung auf einen bisher unbesetzten Arbeitsplatz erfolge, so die Ministerin. "Spekulationen eines freiheitlichen Personalvertreters" wolle sie nicht kommentieren. Ortner wurde im vergangenen Jahr nach 17 Jahren an der Spitze des HGM abgelöst. Neben Kritik am Umgang des Museums mit der militärischen Vergangenheit Österreichs war er mit schweren Mobbingvorwürfen konfrontiert. Diese sind aus Tanners Sicht ausgeräumt.
ref: No advertisement was necessary because the appointment was to a previously unoccupied post, according to the minister. She refused to comment on "speculation regarding a liberal staff representative." Ortner was let go last year after 17 years as the head of the MHM. In addition to criticism regarding the museum's handling of Austria's military history, he was also confronted with serious allegations of bullying. Tanner believes that these have been resolved.
draft_translation: A public call for tender is not required because the appointment is for a previously unfilled position, as the minister stated. She does not wish to comment on "speculations by a liberal employee representative." Ortner was replaced last year after 17 years at the head of the HGM. Alongside criticism of the museum's handling of Austria's military past, he was also confronted with serious allegations of bullying. According to Tanner's view, these have been resolved.
final_translation: A public call for tender is not required because the appointment is for a previously unfilled position, as the minister stated. She does not wish to comment on "speculations by a liberal employee representative." Ortner was replaced last year after 17 years at the head of the HGM. Alongside criticism of the museum's handling of Austria's military past, he was also confronted with serious allegations of bullying. According to Tanner's view, these have been resolved.

src: Jedlaucnik zweifelt auch an der inhaltlichen Eignung Ortners. Dieser sei Experte für den Ersten Weltkrieg und die Kriege der Monarchie, das Institut beschäftige sich aber mit aktuellen Fragen der Sicherheitspolitik.
ref: Jedlaucnik also doubts that Ortner is a suitable candidate. He is an expert on the First World War and wars of the monarchy, but the Institute is concerned with current issues in security policy.
draft_translation: The scholar also doubts the content suitability of Ortners. He is an expert on World War I and the wars of the monarchy, but the institute deals with current questions of security policy.
final_translation: Jedlaucnik also doubts the content appropriateness of Ortners. He is an expert on First World War and the wars of the monarchy, but the institute deals with current questions of security policy.

src: Die SPÖ verlangt von Tanner Aufklärung über den "unüblichen Bestellvorgang". An der Entscheidung hafte der "Anschein von Postenschacher", sagt SPÖ-Wehrsprecher Robert Laimer. Die Neos fordern Tanner auf, die Ernennung zurückzunehmen. Die ÖVP stecke "weiterhin bis zum Hals im Korruptionssumpf", meinte Douglas Hoyos, Sprecher für Landesverteidigung. Er kündigte eine parlamentarische Anfrage zum Thema an.
ref: The Social Democratic Party of Austria requested that Tanner explain the "unusual procedure." The decision suggested the "semblance of position manipulation," said Robert Laimer, Speaker of Defense for the Social Democratic Party of Austria. The Neos demanded that Tanner withdraw the appointment. Douglas Hoyos, State Defense Speaker, believes that the Austrian People's Party is "up to their ears in a cesspool of corruption." He announced a parliamentary inquiry into the subject.
draft_translation: The SPÖ demands clarification from Tanner regarding the "unusual ordering process." The "appearance of a post-chaos," says SPÖ spokesperson Robert Laimer. The Neos demand that Tanner withdraw the appointment. The ÖVP is "still up to its neck in the corruption swamp," said Douglas Hoyos, spokesperson for state defense. He announced a parliamentary inquiry on the matter.
final_translation: The SPÖ demands clarification from Tanner regarding the "unusual ordering process." The "appearance of post-chaos," says SPÖ spokesperson Robert Laimer. The Neos demand that Tanner withdraw the appointment. The ÖVP is "still up to its neck in the corruption swamp," said Douglas Hoyos, spokesperson for state defense. He announced a parliamentary inquiry on the matter.

src: Karneval: Erste Narren gehen vor Kosten in die Knie
ref: Carnival: First revelers brought down by the costs
draft_translation: Carneval: The first jesters bow to costs
final_translation: Carneval: The first jesters submit to costs

src: Thüringens Karnevalshochburg Wasungen will anders als die Landeshauptstadt am traditionellen Faschingsumzug festhalten. Allerdings seien die höheren Kosten unter anderem für die Sicherheit auch in Wasungen schwierig zu bewältigen, sagt Karnevals-Präsident Marcel Kißling. Die Mittel allein dafür machten ungefähr die Hälfte der kalkulierten Gesamtkosten für den Umzug aus.
ref: Unlike the state capital, Thuringia's carnival stronghold in Wasungen wants to maintain the traditional carnival procession. However, according to carnival president Marcel Kißling, the higher costs for security, among other things, are also difficult to manage in Wasungen. The funds for this alone accounted for about half of the calculated total costs of the parade.
draft_translation: Thuringia's Carnival capital, Wasungen, wants to hold onto its traditional carnival parade differently from the state capital. However, the higher costs, especially for security, are difficult to manage in Wasungen, says Carnival President Marcel Kißling. The funds alone for this make up about half of the calculated total costs for the parade.
final_translation: Thuringia's Carnival stronghold, Wasungen, wants to hold onto its traditional carnival parade in a different way from the state capital. However, the higher costs, especially for security, are difficult to manage in Wasungen, says Carnival President Marcel Kißling. The funds alone for this make up about half of the calculated total costs for the parade.

src: In Brandenburg fallen keine Karnevalsumzüge aus. Der "Zug der fröhlichen Leute" in Cottbus, wohl erneut Ostdeutschlands größter, findet erstmals nach der Pandemie statt. Auch bei der schwäbisch-alemannischen Fastnacht wurden keine Umzüge abgesagt.
ref: No carnival parades have been canceled in Brandenburg. The "Procession of Merry People" in Cottbus, probably Eastern Germany's largest once again, will be held for the first time since the pandemic. No parades were canceled at the Swabian-Alemannic carnival either.
draft_translation: In Brandenburg there are no Carnival parades. The "Zug der fröhlichen Leute" in Cottbus, likely once again the largest in Eastern Germany, is taking place for the first time since the pandemic. Also, the Swabian-Alpine Carnival did not cancel any parades.
final_translation: In Brandenburg, there are no Carnival parades. The "Zug der fröhlichen Leute" in Cottbus, likely once again the largest in Eastern Germany, is taking place for the first time since the pandemic. Also, the Swabian-Alpine Carnival had no parades canceled.

src: Schleswig-Holsteins Karnevalshochburg Marne hält trotz der gestiegenen Kosten am traditionellen Umzug fest. "Wir ziehen unsere Veranstaltung durch", sagt der Präsident der Karnevals-Gesellschaft, Heiko Claußen. Aber auch hier drücken die finanziellen Sorgen: Wenn nicht noch mehr Sponsoren gefunden würden oder die bisherigen noch mehr zusteuerten, müssten Rücklagen angetastet werden - "das geht nicht jedes Jahr". Das Defizit derzeit: etwa 200.000 Euro.
ref: Schleswig-Holstein's carnival stronghold of Marne is sticking to its traditional parade despite the increased costs. "We're going through with our event," says the President of the Carnival Society, Heiko Claußen. But here, too, financial worries are pressing: If no more sponsors are found or the previous ones contribute even more, reserves would have to be dipped into - "that's not possible every year." The current deficit: around 200,000 euros.
draft_translation: Schleswig-Holstein's Carnival capital Marne maintains the traditional parade despite increased costs. "We will hold our event," says Heiko Claußen, president of the Carnival Society. However, financial concerns also persist here: if more sponsors are not found or the current ones contribute more, reserves would have to be tapped - "that cannot happen every year." The current deficit: about 200,000 euros.
final_translation: Schleswig-Holstein's Carnival capital Marne keeps the traditional parade despite increased costs. "We will hold our event," says Heiko Claußen, president of the Carnival Society. However, financial concerns also persist here: if more sponsors are not found or the current ones contribute additional amounts, reserves would have to be drawn - "that cannot happen every year." The current deficit: about 200,000 euros.

src: Und die Inflation: Bei den Süßwaren gebe es teilweise eine Preissteigerung von bis zu 60 Prozent, sagt Elvira Reuther vom Förderverein Nürnberger Fastnachtszug. Durch Glück im Unglück sei 2020 zu viel bestellt worden, weshalb es diesmal noch genug Vorrat gebe. Für den Umzug stehe dennoch bereits fest, dass es teurer werde. Für die Sicherheit werde doppelt so viel Personal benötigt wie 2020.
ref: And there's inflation: Prices for some confectionery products have risen by up to 60 percent, says Elvira Reuther from the Nuremberg Carnival Parade Support Association. Luckily, too much was ordered in 2020, which is why there are still enough supplies this time. As for the parade, however, it is already clear that it will be more expensive. Twice as many security personnel will be needed compared to 2020.
draft_translation: And inflation: There is a price increase of up to 60 percent for confectionery, says Elvira Reuther from the Nürnberger Carnival Train Association. Due to luck in misfortune, too much was ordered in 2020, which is why there is still enough stock this time. However, for the move, it is already decided that it will be more expensive. For safety, twice as much staff will be needed as in 2020.
final_translation: Inflation: There is a price increase of up to 60 percent for confectionery, says Elvira Reuther from the Nürnberger Carnival Train Association. Due to luck in misfortune, too much was ordered in 2020, which is why there is still enough stock this time. However, for the relocation, it is already decided that it will be more expensive. For safety, twice as much staff will be needed as in 2020.

src: Wer am Rosenmontagszug im Rheinland am Wegesrand steht, könnte weniger Kamelle bekommen als früher. Weil Süßigkeiten teurer geworden sind, haben einige Zugteilnehmer nicht so viel dabei. Kamelle hin oder her, der Besucherandrang dürfte groß sein: "Ich glaube, wenn es an dem Tag nicht aus Kübeln regnen sollte, dann können wir durchaus mit einem erhöhten Menschenandrang rechnen", sagt der Kölner Zugleiter Holger Kirsch. "Das ist der Tatsache geschuldet, dass zwei Jahre eben kein regulärer Rosenmontagszug stattgefunden hat. Der Zug ist natürlich durch nichts zu ersetzen".
ref: Anyone standing on the side of the road at the Rose-Monday parade in the Rhineland could get fewer caramels than in the past. Because candy has become more expensive, some parade participants don't have very much with them. Caramels or not, the number of visitors is likely to be high: "I think that if it isn't pouring rain that day, we can definitely expect an increase in the number of people," says Holger Kirsch, head of the Cologne parade. "That's due to the fact that there hasn't been a regular Rose-Monday procession for two years. There is of course no substitute for the parade."
draft_translation: Who stands on the roadside during the Rosenmontagszug in the Rhine region may receive fewer candy apples than before. Because sweets have become more expensive, some participants do not have as much money with them. Whether or not the candy apples are available, the crowd is likely to be large: "I believe that if it does not rain from the buckets on that day, we can certainly expect an increased crowd," says Cologne Rosenmontagszug director Holger Kirsch. "This is due to the fact that two years have not had a regular Rosenmontagszug. The parade cannot be replaced by anything."
final_translation: Who is standing on the roadside during the Rosenmontagszug in the Rhine region may receive fewer candy apples than before. Because sweets have become more expensive, some participants do not have as much cash with them. Whether or not the candy apples are available, the crowd is likely to be large: "I believe that if it does not rain from the buckets on that day, we can certainly expect an increased crowd," says Cologne Rosenmontagszug director Holger Kirsch. "This is due to the fact that two years have not had a regular Rosenmontagszug. The parade cannot be replaced by anything."

src: Zu Kosten äußert sich das Festkomitee in Köln nicht im Detail. Der Zug sei aber generell "defizitär", das sei kein Geheimnis.
ref: The festival committee in Cologne doesn't comment on costs in detail. However, the parade is generally "unprofitable," which isn't a secret.
draft_translation: The committee in Cologne does not specify the costs in detail. However, the train is generally "deficit," which is no secret.
final_translation: The committee in Cologne does not specify the costs in detail. However, the train service is generally "deficient," which is no secret.

src: Das Ukraine-Tagebuch: Träume und selbgebrannter Wodka
ref: The Ukraine journal: Dreams and homemade vodka
draft_translation: Das Ukraine-Tagebuch: Dreams and Self-Burnt Vodka
final_translation: Ukraine Diary: Dreams and Self-Made Vodka

src: Die Ukrainer gelten nicht umsonst als trinkfest. Es gibt heimisches Bier wie Obolon aus Kiew oder Bier aus Lemberg. Immer mal entdecke ich hier deutsches Bier. Kein Kulmbacher, aber andere Großbrauereien wie Krombacher oder Warsteiner. Ich kann da im Geschmack keinen großen Unterschied feststellen. Das Gleiche gilt für den Wodka, der weit verbreitet ist. Den brennen sie hier vor allem auf den Dörfern selbst. Sie nennen ihn Samargon. Wie viel davon in den früheren Sowjetrepubliken genau konsumiert wird, weiß niemand. In Russland hat die Gesundheitsministerin vor ein paar Jahren behauptet, der Verbrauch sei in fünf Jahren um sagenhafte 80 Prozent gesunken. Nun ja, man sieht eben auch hier, wie wenig man den Russen glauben kann. Es heißt, man solle als Tourist vorsichtig damit sein. Aber das gilt nur, wenn er in den massenhaften Verkauf geht. Da wird dann wohl auch gepanscht.
ref: Ukrainians are not known as heavy drinkers for nothing. There is local beer like Obolon from Kyiv or beer from Lviv. Every now and then I discover German beer here. Not Kulmbacher, but other large breweries like Krombacher or Warsteiner. I don't notice a big difference in taste. The same goes for vodka, which is widely available. They mainly distill it here in the villages themselves. They call it samargon. No one knows exactly how much of it is consumed in the former Soviet republics. The health minister in Russia claimed a few years ago that consumption had fallen by a staggering 80 percent in five years. Well, this is another example of how little you can believe the Russians. They say tourists should be careful with it. But that only applies when it is sold in bulk. Then it is probably also watered down.
draft_translation: The Ukrainians are not without reason called drink-proof. There is local beer such as Obolon from Kyiv or beer from Lemberg. I often discover German beer here. Not Kulmbacher, but other large breweries like Krombacher or Warsteiner. I can't detect a big difference in taste. The same goes for vodka, which is widely consumed here. They distill it mainly on the villages themselves. They call it Samargon. Exactly how much of it was consumed in the former Soviet republics is unknown. In Russia, the health minister once claimed that consumption had dropped by a remarkable 80 percent in five years. Well, one sees how little one can believe the Russians. It is said one should be careful with it as a tourist. But that only applies when it comes to mass sales. Then, of course, it is likely to be pumped up.
final_translation: The Ukrainians are not without reason called drunk-resistant. There is local beer such as Obolon from Kyiv or beer from Lemberg. I often discover German beer here. Not Kulmbacher, but other large breweries like Krombacher or Warsteiner. I can't detect a big difference in taste. The same goes for vodka, which is widely consumed here. They distill it mainly in the villages themselves. They call it Samargon. Exactly how much of it was consumed in the former Soviet republics is unknown. In Russia, the health minister once claimed that consumption had dropped by a remarkable 80 percent in five years. Well, one sees how little one can believe the Russians. It is said one should be careful with it as a tourist. But that only applies when it comes to mass sales. Then, of course, it is likely to be diluted.

src: Wer mit Cocktails das Wochenende feiern oder ein Bier zum Feierabend trinken möchte, findet in Rostock und Warnemünde tolle Lokale dafür. Die Restaurant-Szene bietet viele Locations für After-Work-Treffen oder das Vorglühen für Club-Partys. Wo ist es am besten? Ein Blick auf die Google-Bewertungen zeigt es.

The restaurant scene offers many locations for after-work get-togethers or pre-drinks for club parties. Where is it the best? A look at the Google reviews shows it.

final_translation: Those who want to celebrate the weekend with cocktails or drink a beer at the end of the evening will find great places in Rostock and Warnemünde. src: Bundespräsident Frank-Walter Steinmeier und seine Frau Elke Büdenbender werden an der Arena von Schornsteinfeger-Meister Tobias Böttger und dem Oberhofer Maskottchen "Flocke" begrüßt
ref: Federal President Frank-Walter Steinmeier and his wife Elke Büdenbender are welcomed at the arena by master chimney sweep Tobias Böttger and Oberhof mascot "Flocke"
draft_translation: The President of the Federal Republic, Frank-Walter Steinmeier, and his wife, Elke Büdenbender, will be greeted at the arena by master plumbers Tobias Böttger and the Oberhofer mascot "Flocke".
final_translation: The President of the Federal Republic, Frank-Walter Steinmeier, and his wife, Elke Büdenbender, will be greeted at the arena by master chimney sweepers Tobias Böttger and the Oberhofer mascot "Flocke".

src: Oberhof. Die deutschen Biathleten hatten beim WM-Sprint von Oberhof nichts mit der Medaillenvergabe zu tun. Doch es gab zwei Lichtblicke im Nebel.
ref: Oberhof. The German biathletes were not involved in the medal ceremony at the World Cup sprint in Oberhof. But there were two rays of hope in the fog.
draft_translation: The athletes from Germany had nothing to do with the medal distribution at the World Cup sprint in Oberhof. However, there were two bright spots in the fog.
final_translation: The athletes from Germany had nothing to do with the medal distribution at the World Cup sprint in Oberhof. However, there were two glowing spots in the fog.

src: So sehr sich der Bundespräsident auch anstrengte, von der Ehrentribüne aus war am Samstag nicht zu erkennen, ob die Scheiben an der Schießbahn auch wirklich fielen. "Ich musste mir die Ergebnisse übers Handy holen", gab Frank-Walter Steinmeier schmunzelnd zu und verwies auf die immer wieder ins Stadion ziehenden Nebelschwaden, die die Sicht am Rennsteig für die Zuschauer stark beeinträchtigten.
ref: No matter how hard the Federal President tried, it was impossible to tell from the grandstand on Saturday whether the targets on the shooting range were actually falling. "I had to get the results on my cell phone," Frank-Walter Steinmeier admitted with a smile, referring to the fog that kept drifting into the stadium and greatly impaired the view of the spectators at the racetrack.
draft_translation: So hard the President of the Bundesrepublik tried, on Saturday it was not possible to tell from the honor stand whether the bullets really fell through the target. "I had to get the results via my mobile phone," Frank-Walter Steinmeier smiled and referred to the constantly increasing fog that spread into the stadium, which greatly impaired the view for the spectators on the Rennsteig.
final_translation: How hard the President of the Federal Republic of Germany tried, on Saturday it was not possible to tell from the honor stand whether the bullets really fell through the target. "I had to get the results via my mobile phone," Frank-Walter Steinmeier smiled and referred to the constantly spreading fog that spread into the stadium, which greatly impaired the view for the spectators on the Rennsteig.

src: Steinmeier genoss dennoch den Besuch des 10-km-Sprintrennens bei der Biathlon-WM in Oberhof, bekam von den Olympiasiegern Frank Ullrich und Peter Sendel zahlreiche Tipps: "Seit den Olympischen Spielen in Südkorea, als Laura Dahlmeier im ersten Rennen Gold gewonnen hatte, fasziniert mich das Biathlon", verriet er und lobte Oberhof außerdem für seine modernisierten Sportstätten: "Die runderneuerte Arena ist großartig und bietet ideale Bedingungen. Das sagen auch die Sportler - mit Dank an diejenigen, die seit Vergabe der WM hier angepackt haben". Auch in Sachen Nachhaltigkeit sei der Standort jetzt vielen anderen "einen Schritt voraus" und damit "für die nächsten Jahre und sogar Jahrzehnte sicher".
ref: Steinmeier nevertheless enjoyed attending the 10-km sprint at the Biathlon World Cup in Oberhof, getting plenty of tips from Olympic champions Frank Ullrich and Peter Sendel: "The biathlon has fascinated me ever since the Olympic Games in South Korea, when Laura Dahlmeier won gold in the first race," he revealed, and also praised Oberhof for its modernized sports facilities: "The completely renovated arena is amazing and offers ideal conditions. The athletes also say that - with thanks to those who have helped out here since the World Cup was awarded." In terms of sustainability, too, the site is now "one step ahead" of many others, making it "safe for the years and even decades ahead."
draft_translation: Steinmeier still enjoyed the visit to the 10-km sprint at the Biathlon World Championships in Oberhof, receiving many tips from the Olympic champions Frank Ullrich and Peter Sendel: "Since the Olympic Games in South Korea, when Laura Dahlmeier won gold in her first race, I have been fascinated by biathlon," he revealed, and also praised Oberhof for its modernized sports facilities: "The newly renovated arena is fantastic and offers ideal conditions. The athletes also say this - thank you to those who have worked on it since the World Championship was awarded here. In terms of sustainability, the location is now ahead of many others and is therefore "safe for the next years and even decades."
final_translation: Steinmeier still enjoyed the visit to the 10-km sprint at the Biathlon World Championships in Oberhof, receiving many tips from the Olympic champions Frank Ullrich and Peter Sendel: "Since the Olympic Games in South Korea, when Laura Dahlmeier won gold in her first race, I have been fascinated by biathlon," he revealed, and also praised Oberhof for its modernized sports facilities: "The newly renovated arena is fantastic and offers ideal conditions. The athletes also say this - thank you to those who have worked on it since the World Championship was awarded here. In terms of sustainability, the location is now ahead of many others and is therefore "safe for the next years and even decades."

src: Sportlich enteilte wieder einmal der Norweger Johannes Thingnes Bö der Konkurrenz. Trotz einer Strafrunde nach einem Schießfehler sicherte er sich in 23:21.7 Minuten den sechsten Sieg im sechsten Sprint des Winters - und damit seinen zweiten WM-Titel in Oberhof. Hinter ihm machten sein fehlerfrei schießender Bruder Tarjei (14,8 Sekunden zurück) und Sturla Holm Lägreid (1 Strafrunde/39,9 Sekunden) sowie Johannes Dale (1/43,6) den norwegischen Vierfachsieg perfekt.
ref: In terms of sport, Norway's Johannes Thingnes Bö once again surpassed the competition. Despite a penalty lap after a shooting mistake, he earned his sixth victory in the sixth sprint of the winter in 23:21.7 minutes - winning his second World Cup title in Oberhof. Behind him, his brother Tarjei (14.8 seconds behind), Sturla Holm Lägreid (1 miss/39.9 seconds), and Johannes Dale (1/43.6) completed the perfect Norwegian quadruple victory.
draft_translation: The Norwegian Johannes Thingnes Bö once again decisively defeated the competition. Despite a penalty after a missed shot, he secured the sixth win in the sixth sprint of the winter in 23:21.7 minutes, and thus his second World Championship title in Oberhof. Behind him, his error-free brother Tarjei (14.8 seconds behind) and Sturla Holm Lägreid (1 penalty/39.9 seconds) as well as Johannes Dale (1/43.6) completed the Norwegian four-sport victory.
final_translation: The Norwegian Johannes Thingnes Bö once again decisively defeated the competition. Despite a penalty after a missed shot, he secured the sixth win in the sixth sprint of the winter in 23:21.7 minutes, and thus his second World Championship title in Oberhof. Behind him, his error-free brother Tarjei (14.8 seconds behind) and Sturla Holm Lägreid (1 penalty/39.9 seconds) as well as Johannes Dale (1/43.6) completed the Norwegian four-sport victory.

src: Die einheimischen Skijäger konnten einen Tag nach Denise Herrmann-Wicks Triumph nicht in den Kampf um die Medaillen eingreifen. Johannes Kühn belegte nach einem Schießfehler und mit einem Rückstand von 1:04.8 Minuten als bester Deutscher den achten Rang. WM-Debütant Justus Strelow schoss makellos und wurde Zwölfter (1:14.6). Zwei Lichtblicke hinter dem grauen Schleier. Dagegen enttäuschte Benedikt Doll erneut. Nach seinem verpatzten Mixed-Einsatz am Mittwoch ließ der Schwarzwälder diesmal fünf Scheiben stehen und verschwand als 55. tief enttäuscht und kommentarlos in der Kabine.
ref: The local ski shooters were unable to participate in the fight for the medals one day after Denise Herrmann-Wick's triumph. Johannes Kühn was the best German, finishing eighth after a shooting error and 1:04.8 minutes back. World Cup debutant Justus Strelow shot flawlessly and finished twelfth (1:14.6). Two bright spots behind the gray haze. In contrast, Benedikt Doll disappointed again. After his failed mixed event on Wednesday, the Black Forest athlete left five targets standing this time and disappeared into the dressing room in 55th place, deeply disappointed and without comment.
draft_translation: The local ski jumpers could not enter the competition for the medals the day after Denise Herrmann-Wicks victory. Johannes Kühn finished eighth as the best German after a shooting error and a 1 minute and 4.8 second deficit. World Championship debutant Justus Strelow shot perfectly and finished twelfth (1:14.6). Two glimmers behind the gray veil. In contrast, Benedikt Doll once again let down. After his botched mixed event on Wednesday, the Schwarzweller left five targets unshot and disappeared as the 55th, disappointed and silent, into the cabin.
final_translation: The local ski jumpers could not compete for the medals the day after Denise Herrmann-Wicks victory. Johannes Kühn finished eighth as the best German after a shooting error and a 1 minute and 4.8-second deficit. World Championship debutant Justus Strelow shot perfectly and finished twelfth (1:14.6). Two glimmers behind the gray veil. In contrast, Benedikt Doll once again let down. After his botched mixed event on Wednesday, the Schwarzweller left five targets unshot and disappeared as the 55th, disappointed and silent, into the cabin.

src: Bö war vor 14.300 Zuschauern mit der Nummer 1 ins Rennen gegangen und manifestierte diesen Status trotz der komplizierten Sichtverhältnisse. Allerdings: Bei seinen letzten beiden Stehendschüssen hatte er das Glück des Tüchtigen; sie landeten jeweils am Rand der Scheiben und fielen trotzdem. Die Siegerehrung genoss der 29-Jährige dann gemeinsam mit seinem fünf Jahre älteren Bruder: "Es ist das beste Gefühl, mit ihm hier zu stehen", sagte der Weltmeister: "Wir sind die beste Familie, die besten Brüder, die besten Athleten".
ref: Bö had started the race in front of 14,300 spectators with the number 1 and embodied this status despite the difficult visibility. However: He was lucky with his last two standing shots; they both hit the edge of the targets and still fell. The 29-year-old then enjoyed the award ceremony together with his older brother, five years his senior: "It's the best feeling to stand here with him," said the world champion: "We are the best family, the best brothers, the best athletes."
draft_translation: Bö went into the race with 14,300 spectators and number one status, maintaining this position despite the difficult visibility conditions. However: In his last two standing shots, he had the luck of the skilled; they landed on the edge of the glass and still fell. The victory ceremony was shared by the 29-year-old together with his five-year-old brother: "It's the best feeling to be here with him," said the world champion: "We are the best family, the best brothers, the best athletes."
final_translation: Bö entered the race with 14,300 spectators and number one status, maintaining this position despite the difficult visibility conditions. However: In his last two standing shots, he had the luck of the skilled; they landed on the edge of the glass and still fell. The victory ceremony was shared by the 29-year-old together with his five-year-old brother: "It's the best feeling to be here with him," said the world champion: "We are the best family, the best brothers, the best athletes."

src: Es gibt kaum Zweifel daran, dass die Norweger auch die Verfolgung am Sonntag dominieren werden. Bei den Frauen ruhen dagegen die deutschen Hoffnungen auf Herrmann-Wick. "Wenn du mit der Nummer eins startest, ist das Ziel nicht, als Zehnte reinzukommen. Es gibt nur Vollgas und Attacke, um die Nummer eins zu verteidigen", nahm Sportdirektor Felix Bitterling seine "Lokomotive" in die Pflicht. Die Organisatoren erwarten für die Doppelveranstaltung (13.25 und 15.30 Uhr/ZDF und Eurosport live) eine nahezu ausverkaufte Arena.
ref: There is little doubt that the Norwegians will also dominate the pursuit on Sunday. In the women's race, however, German hopes rest on Herrmann-Wick. "When you start with the number one spot, the goal is not to come in tenth. There is just full throttle and attack to defend the number-one spot," said sports director Felix Bitterling, taking his "locomotive" to task. The organizers expect an almost sold-out arena for the double event (1:25 pm and 3:30 pm/ZDF and Eurosport live).
draft_translation: There is little doubt that the Norwegians will dominate the pursuit on Sunday. However, the German hopes for the women's team are on Herrmann-Wick. "If you start as number one, the goal is not to come in as the tenth. There is only full throttle and attack to defend number one," Sport Director Felix Bitterling took his "Lokomotive" to task. The organizers expect the double event (13:25 and 15:30 PM / ZDF and Eurosport live) to see nearly sold-out arena.
final_translation: There is little doubt that the Norwegians will dominate the pursuit on Sunday. However, the German hopes for the women's team are on Herrmann-Wick. "If you start as number one, the goal is not to come in as the tenth. There is only full throttle and attack to defend number one," Sport Director Felix Bitterling took his "Lokomotive" to task. The organizers expect the double event (13:25 and 15:30 PM / ZDF and Eurosport live) to see a nearly sold-out arena.

src: Brych missfällt "Bienenschwarm" auf dem Platz
ref: Brych irritated by "swarm of bees" on the field
draft_translation: Brych doesn't like "Bienenkorb" on the spot
final_translation: Brych doesn't like "Bee swarm" on the spot

src: Felix Brych - Schiedsrichter Felix Brych entscheidet auf Schiedsrichterball.
ref: Felix Brych - referee Felix Brych decides to call a dropped ball.
draft_translation: Felix Brych - Referee Felix Brych decides on the referee ball.

src: Aggressiv anlaufende Spieler oder meckernde Trainer? Deutschlands Schiedsrichter wollen Unsportlichkeiten "konsequent ahnden". Schiedsrichter-Chef Fröhlich weist auf eine Vorbildfunktion hin.
ref: Aggressive players or grumbling coaches? Germany's referees want to "consistently punish" unsportsmanlike conduct. Referee boss Fröhlich suggests a role model function.
draft_translation: Aggressive players or complaining coaches? German referees want to consistently penalize unsportsmanlike behavior. Referee chief Fröhlich points to the role of an example.
final_translation: Aggressive players or complaining coaches? German referees want to consistently penalize unsportsmanlike behavior. Referee chief Fröhlich emphasizes the example function.

src: Der deutsche Spitzenschiedsrichter Felix Brych hat negative Tendenzen im Miteinander auf dem Spielfeld ausgemacht. "Ich finde schon, dass es neue Verhaltensweisen der Spieler gibt, die den Schiedsrichter nach Entscheidungen ein bisschen wie ein Bienenschwarm umringen und versuchen, ihn in die Review-Area zu drängen", sagte der 47-Jährige der Deutschen Presse-Agentur. "Das haben wir in der Winterpause besprochen. Wir haben beschlossen, dass wir solche Unsportlichkeiten nicht akzeptieren wollen. Darauf werden wir wieder stärker achten - und werden es auch sanktionieren".
ref: Top German referee Felix Brych has identified negative tendencies in the way players interact on the pitch. "I really think that there is new behavior among players who surround the referee after decisions a bit like a swarm of bees and try to push him into the review area," the 47-year-old told Deutsche Presse-Agentur. "We discussed that during the winter break. We decided that we won't accept such unsportsmanlike conduct. We will pay closer attention to that again - and will also sanction it."
draft_translation: The top German referee Felix Brych has identified negative tendencies among players on the field. "I think there are new behaviors by the players that make the referee feel like being surrounded by a swarm of bees and try to push him into the review area," said the 47-year-old to the German Press Agency. "We discussed this during the winter break. We have decided that we do not want to accept such unsportsmanlike behavior. We will pay more attention to this and will also sanction it."
final_translation: The top German referee Felix Brych has identified negative tendencies among players on the field. "I think there are new behaviors by the players that make the referee feel like being surrounded by a swarm of bees and try to push him into the review area," said the 47-year-old to the German Press Agency. "We discussed this during the winter break. We have decided that we do not want to accept such unsportsmanlike behavior. We will pay more attention to this and will also sanction it."

src: Zuletzt waren auch zwei Trainer mit Platzverweisen bedacht worden. Der Mainzer Coach Bo Svensson hatte bei der Pokal-Niederlage gegen den FC Bayern die Rote Karte gesehen. Für Freiburgs Trainer Christian Streich gab es der Liga-Niederlage in Dortmund Gelb-Rot. "Auch das Trainerverhalten fällt in den Bereich der Unsportlichkeiten. Uns ist aufgefallen, dass Unsportlichkeiten auch in diesem Bereich zugenommen haben, dass das Verhalten uns Schiedsrichtern gegenüber ein bisschen fordernder oder aggressiver geworden ist. Auch solche Unsportlichkeiten wollen wir konsequent ahnden", sagte Brych.
ref: Two coaches were also recently sent off. Mainz coach Bo Svensson was shown the red card in the cup defeat against FC Bayern. For Freiburg's coach Christian Streich, there was yellow and red in the league defeat in Dortmund. "The coaches' behavior also falls into the category of unsportsmanlike conduct. We have noticed that unsportsmanlike conduct has also increased in this area, that the behavior towards us referees has become a bit more demanding or aggressive. We also want to consistently punish such unsportsmanlike conduct," said Brych.
draft_translation: Finally, two coaches were also taken into account with yellow cards. The Mainz coach Bo Svensson received a red card for the Cup defeat against FC Bayern. For Freiburg's coach Christian Streich, the league defeat in Dortmund resulted in a yellow-red card. "Also the behavior of the coaches falls into the area of unsportsmanlike conduct. We have noticed that unsportsmanlike behavior has increased in this area, and this behavior has become a bit more demanding or aggressive towards the referees. Also such unsportsmanlike behaviors we want to deal with consistently," said Brych.
final_translation: Finally, two coaches were also considered with caution. The Mainz coach Bo Svensson received a red card for the Cup defeat against FC Bayern. For Freiburg's coach Christian Streich, the league defeat in Dortmund resulted in a yellow card. "Also, such unsportsmanlike behaviors fall into the area of unsportsmanlike conduct. We have noticed that unsportsmanlike behavior has increased in this area, and this behavior has become a bit more demanding or aggressive towards the referees. Also such unsportsmanlike behaviors we want to deal with consistently," said Brych.

src: DFB-Schiedsrichter-Chef Lutz Michael Fröhlich wies auf ein grundsätzlich gutes Miteinander von Trainern und Unparteiischen hin. "Insgesamt passt das Verhältnis. Es gibt Reaktionen, darauf folgen konsequente Gegenreaktionen. Damit muss dann der Betroffene leben. Das dürfte doch nichts Weltbewegendes sein", sagte Fröhlich der Deutschen Presse-Agentur.
ref: DFB head referee Lutz Michael Fröhlich referred to the generally good cooperation between coaches and referees. "Overall, the relationship works. There are reactions, followed by consistent counter-reactions. The person concerned just has to live with it. That shouldn't be the end of the world," Fröhlich told the Deutsche Presse-Agentur.
draft_translation: DFB Referee Chief Lutz Michael Fröhlich pointed to a generally good relationship between coaches and referees. "Overall, the ratio is good. There are reactions, followed by consistent counter-reactions. Then the affected person has to live with that. That should certainly not be world-changing," said Fröhlich to the German Press Agency.
final_translation: DFB Referee Chief Lutz Michael Fröhlich pointed to a generally good relationship between coaches and referees. "Overall, the relationship is good. There are reactions, followed by consistent counter-reactions. Then the affected person has to live with that. That should certainly not be world-changing," said Fröhlich to the German Press Agency.

src: "Aus der Emotionalität können im Spielverlauf durchaus Konflikte entstehen. Aber wenn die Emotionalität in eine persönliche Verunglimpfung überschwappt, dann muss man auch akzeptieren, dass die entsprechenden Maßnahmen von Schiedsrichterseite getroffen werden", sagte Fröhlich. In den jüngsten Fällen hätten die Beteiligten die Dinge im Nachgang ausgeräumt. "Wichtig wäre es nur, wenn dann auch mal ein Umdenkprozess insgesamt in Gang käme, dass sich solch ein Verhalten einfach nicht gehört", sagte Fröhlich am Rande einer Veranstaltung des Verbandes Deutscher Sportjournalisten in München.
ref: "Conflicts can certainly arise when emotions run high in the course of the game. But if emotions spill over into personal denigration, then you also have to accept that the appropriate measures will be taken by the referees," Fröhlich said. In recent cases, the parties involved cleared things up in the aftermath. "It is only important that a change of thinking comes into play that doesn't include such behavior," said Fröhlich on the sidelines of an event organized by the Association of German Sports Journalists in Munich.
draft_translation: Affection can certainly lead to conflicts during the course of a game. However, if the affection spills over into personal defamation, then one must also accept that the appropriate measures will be taken by the referees," said Fröhlich. In recent cases, the involved parties have cleared things up afterwards. "It would be important if, then, a change of mind process could begin overall, so that such behavior would simply not be acceptable," said Fröhlich at the edge of an event organized by the German Sports Journalists' Association in Munich.

src: Der 65-Jährige wies auf mögliche Auswirkungen auf anderer Ebene hin. "Natürlich färben Vorkommnisse aus dem Profifußball immer ab. Da gibt es einen Vorbildeffekt, daraus resultiert Nachahmung. In den jüngsten Fällen in der Bundesliga haben die Schiedsrichter konsequent auf negative Verhaltensweisen reagiert", sagte Fröhlich. "Unabhängig von der konsequenten Regelauslegung im Spiel ist ein klärendes Gespräch, mit einem Austausch der Perspektiven zwischen den Schiedsrichtern und den Betroffenen, immer hilfreich".
ref: The 65-year-old pointed to possible repercussions at another level. "Of course, incidents from professional soccer always rub off. There's a role model effect, which results in imitation. In recent cases in the Bundesliga, referees have consistently reacted to negative behavior," said Fröhlich. "Regardless of the consistent interpretation of the rules in the game, a conversation to clarify things, with an exchange of perspectives between the referees and those affected, is always helpful."
draft_translation: The 65-year-old pointed out possible effects on another level. "Of course, incidents from professional football always have an impact. There is a role model effect, which leads to imitation. In recent cases in the Bundesliga, the referees have consistently reacted to negative behavior," said Fröhlich. "Regardless of the consistent interpretation of the rules during the game, a clarifying conversation, with an exchange of perspectives between the referees and the involved parties, is always helpful."
final_translation: The 65-year-old pointed out possible effects on another level. "Of course, incidents from professional football always have an impact. There is a role model effect, which leads to imitation. In recent cases in the Bundesliga, the referees have consistently reacted to negative behavior," said Fröhlich. "Regardless of the consistent interpretation of the rules during the game, a clarifying conversation, with an exchange of perspectives between the referees and the involved parties, is always helpful."

src: Kombinierer Oftebro siegt in Schonach
ref: Combined skier Oftebro wins in Schonach
draft_translation: Kombinierer Oftebro wins in Schonach
final_translation: Kombinierer Oftebro wins in Schonach

src: Den Sieg sicherte sich nach einem Sprung von der Normalschanze und dem zehn Kilometer langen Skilanglaufrennen der Norweger Jens Luraas Oftebro vor dem österreichischen Gesamtführenden Johannes Lamparter. Dritter wurde Kristjan Ilves aus Estland.
ref: The victory was secured by Norway’s Jens Luraas Oftebro after a jump from the normal hill and the ten-kilometer-long cross-country ski race, ahead of Austrian overall leader Johannes Lamparter. Third place went to Estonia’s Kristjan Ilves.
draft_translation: Jens Luraas Oftebro of Norway secured the victory after a jump from the normal slope and the 10 km ski cross race, ahead of the overall leader Johannes Lamparter of Austria. Third place was taken by Kristjan Ilves from Estonia.
final_translation: Jens Luraas Oftebro of Norway secured the victory after a jump from the normal ski jump and the 10 km ski race, ahead of overall leader Johannes Lamparter of Austria. Kristjan Ilves from Estonia took third place.

src: Die deutschen Kombinierer treten im Schwarzwald nicht in Bestbesetzung an. Peking-Olympiasieger Vinzenz Geiger, Eric Frenzel und Johannes Rydzek sind nicht dabei. Sie bereiten sich mit Training in Oberstdorf auf die Weltmeisterschaften vor, die vom 21. Februar bis zum 5. März im slowenischen Planica stattfinden. "Wir haben drei Weltklasse-Athleten zu Hause. Das spürt die Mannschaft natürlich", sagte Bundestrainer Hermann Weinbuch im ZDF.
ref: The best German combined skiers aren't participating in the Black Forest. Beijing Olympic champions Vinzenz Geiger, Eric Frenzel, and Johannes Rydzek won't be there. They're training in Oberstdorf to prepare for the World Championships, which will be held in Planica, Slovenia, from February 21st to March 5th. "We have three world-class athletes at home. The team senses that, of course," national coach Hermann Weinbuch said on ZDF.
