draft_translation: The German combination teams are not fully staffed in the Schwarzwald. Peking Olympic gold medalist Vinzenz Geiger, Eric Frenzel, and Johannes Rydzek are not participating. They are training in Oberstdorf to prepare for the World Championships, which will take place from February 21st to March 5th in Planica, Slovenia. "We have three world-class athletes at home. The team obviously feels this," said Bundestrainer Hermann Weinbuch on ZDF.
final_translation: The German combination athletes are not fully staffed in the Schwarzwald. Peking Olympic gold medalist Vinzenz Geiger, Eric Frenzel, and Johannes Rydzek are not participating. They are training in Oberstdorf to prepare for the World Championships, which will take place from February 21st to March 5th in Planica, Slovenia. "We have three world-class athletes at home. The team obviously feels this," said Bundestrainer Hermann Weinbuch on ZDF.

src: Sieben Leichtverletzte nach Auffahrunfall auf A5
ref: Seven slightly injured in rear-end collision on A5
draft_translation: Seven lightly injured after collision on A5
final_translation: Seven lightly injured after collision on A5

src: Sieben Menschen sind bei einem Unfall mit vier Fahrzeugen auf der Autobahn 5 bei Hemsbach (Rhein-Neckar-Kreis) leicht verletzt worden, darunter zwei Kinder. Laut einer Mitteilung der Polizei war es am Samstag zu dem Auffahrunfall gekommen, als ein Autofahrer während eines leichten Rückstaus von hinten gegen einen Wagen stieß und ihn auf zwei weitere Autos schob. Die Vollsperrung der Fahrspuren in Richtung Heidelberg sei nach etwa eineinhalb Stunden aufgehoben worden.
ref: Seven people, including two children, were slightly injured in a four-car accident on Autobahn 5 near Hemsbach (Rhine-Neckar District). According to a police statement, the rear-end collision occurred on Saturday when a motorist crashed into a car from behind in light traffic, plowing it into two other cars. The lanes in the direction of Heidelberg were reopened after being closed for about an hour and a half.
draft_translation: Seven people were lightly injured in a collision involving four vehicles on Autobahn 5 near Hemsbach (Rhein-Neckar-Kreis), including two children. According to a police statement, the rear-end collision occurred on Saturday when a driver, during a light traffic jam, hit a car from behind and pushed it into two other vehicles. The full closure of the lanes toward Heidelberg was lifted after about one and a half hours.
final_translation: Seven people were lightly injured in a collision involving four vehicles on Autobahn 5 near Hemsbach (Rhein-Neckar-Kreis), including two children. According to a police statement, the rear-end collision occurred on Saturday when a driver, during a light traffic congestion, hit a car from behind and pushed it into two other vehicles. The full closure of the lanes heading toward Heidelberg was lifted after approximately one and a half hours.

src: Finissage im Marler Skulpturenmuseum
ref: Finale at sculpture museum in Marl
draft_translation: Finissage at the Marler Sculpture Museum
final_translation: Finissage at the Marler Sculpture Museum

src: Haben die Ausstellung ins Leben gerufen: die Initiatoren Sebastian Freytag (li.) und Georg Elben (re.) stehen mit Künstler Christian Freudenberger vor seinem Wandbild.
ref: Organized the exhibition: the organizers Sebastian Freytag (left) and Georg Elben (right) stand with artist Christian Freudenberger in front of his mural.
draft_translation: The exhibition came to life: the initiators Sebastian Freytag (left) and Georg Elben (right) stand in front of artist Christian Freudenberger's wall painting.
final_translation: The exhibition came to life: the initiators Sebastian Freytag (left) and Georg Elben (right) stood in front of artist Christian Freudenberger's painting.

src: Am Sonntag, 12. Februar, endet im Marler Skulpturenmuseum eine ungewöhnliche Ausstellung. Zum Finale gibt es einige Extras.
ref: On Sunday, February 12th, an unusual exhibition ends at the sculpture museum in Marl. There are some extras for the finale.
draft_translation: On Sunday, February 12th, an unusual exhibition ends at the Marler Sculpture Museum. For the finale, there are some extra features.
final_translation: On Sunday, February 12th, an unusual exhibition ends at the Marler Sculpture Museum. For the finale, there are some extra elements.

src: Die Finissage zu der Ausstellung "Wandgebunden" findet am Sonntag, 12. Februar, um 15 Uhr im Übergangsquartier des Marler Skulpturenmuseums in der Georg-Herwegh-Straße 63-67 statt. In drei Ausstellungsräumen ziehen jeweils zwei großformatige Wandgemälde die Aufmerksamkeit auf sich.
ref: The finale for the "Wallbound" exhibition will be held on Sunday, February 12th, at 3:00 pm in the transitional quarters of the sculpture museum in Marl located at Georg-Herwegh-Strasse 63-67. Two large-format murals in each of the three exhibition rooms will attract your attention.
draft_translation: The opening of the exhibition "Wandgebunden" takes place on Sunday, February 12th, at 3 PM in the transitional quarter of the Marler Sculpture Museum at Georg-Herwegh Street 63-67. In three exhibition rooms, two large-format wall paintings each draw attention.
final_translation: The closing of the exhibition "Wandgebunden" takes place on Sunday, February 12th, at 3 PM in the transitional quarter of the Marler Sculpture Museum at Georg-Herwegh Street 63-67. In three exhibition rooms, two large-format wall paintings each draw attention.

src: Nach der Ausstellung werden die Wände überstrichen, die Kunstwerke verschwinden. Ein Katalog dokumentiert jedoch die speziell für das Marler Museum entstandenen Arbeiten. Er wird am 12. Februar von den beiden Kuratoren Georg Elben und Sebastian Freytag vorgestellt.
ref: After the exhibition, the walls will be painted over and the artworks will disappear. However, a catalog documents the works created especially for the Marl museum. It will be presented by the two curators, Georg Elben and Sebastian Freytag, on February 12th.
draft_translation: After the exhibition, the walls will be repainted, and the artworks will disappear. However, a catalog documents the specially created works for the Marler Museum. It will be presented by the two curators Georg Elben and Sebastian Freytag on February 12th.
final_translation: After the exhibition, the walls will be repainted, and the artworks will disappear. However, a catalog documents the specially created works for the Marler Museum. It will be presented by the two curators Georg Elben and Sebastian Freytag on February 12th.

src: Zur Finissage wird Dr. Friederike Schuler außerdem einen Vortrag zu wandgebundener Kunst im Dienst der Gemeinschaft halten. Anhand zahlreicher Bildbeispiele stellt sie die Besonderheiten der Wandmalerei aus der Weimarer Republik vor und fragt nach den Verbindungslinien zu dieser Kunstgattung in der Bundesrepublik mit Schwerpunkt im NRW der 1950er- bis 1970er-Jahre.
ref: At the finale, Dr. Friederike Schuler will also give a lecture on wall-based art in the service of the community. With the aid of numerous example images, she will present the special features of mural paintings from the Weimar Republic and ask for connections between this art genre in the Federal Republic with a focus on North Rhine-Westphalia from the 1950s to the 1970s.
draft_translation: Additionally, Dr. Friederike Schuler will give a lecture on community-oriented art during the final exhibition. Using numerous image examples, she will present the characteristics of wall painting from the Weimar Republic and examine the connections to this art form in the Federal Republic, with a focus on North Rhine-Westphalia in the 1950s to 1970s.
final_translation: Additionally, Dr. Friederike Schuler will give a lecture on community-focused art during the final exhibition. Using numerous image examples, she will present the characteristics of wall-bound art from the Weimar Republic and examine the connections to this art form in the Federal Republic, with a focus on North Rhine-Westphalia in the 1950s to 1970s.

src: Dr. Friederike Schuler ist freie Kunsthistorikerin und Kuratorin und hat 2013 zu der Wandmalerei der Weimarer Republik promoviert. Seither forscht sie zu baugebundener Kunst sowie Kunst- und Institutionsgeschichte der Nachkriegszeit in Deutschland, zuletzt gemeinsam mit Sebastian Freytag zu Kunst am Bau in NRW. Nach dem Vortrag findet die letzte Kuratorenführung durch die Ausstellung statt. Die Künstlerinnen und Künstler sind vor Ort.
ref: Dr. Friederike Schuler is a freelance art historian and curator who did her doctorate on mural painting in the Weimar Republic in 2013. Since then, she has been researching building-related art as well as art and institutional history of the postwar period in Germany, most recently together with Sebastian Freytag on architectural art in North Rhine-Westphalia. The lecture will be followed by the final curatorial tour of the exhibition. The artists will be on site.
draft_translation: Dr. Friederike Schuler is a freelance art historian and curator, and she graduated in 2013 with a dissertation on the wall paintings of the Weimar Republic. Since then, she has researched urban-bound art as well as the history of art and institutions in post-war Germany, most recently together with Sebastian Freytag on art in construction in North Rhine-Westphalia. After the lecture, the final curator's tour through the exhibition takes place. The artists are present.
final_translation: Dr. Friederike Schuler is a freelance art historian and curator, and she graduated in 2013 with a dissertation on the wall paintings of the Weimar Republic. Since then, she has researched art related to architecture as well as the history of art and institutions in post-war Germany, most recently together with Sebastian Freytag on art in the context of construction in North Rhine-Westphalia. After the lecture, the final curator's tour through the exhibition takes place. The artists are present.

src: Haftbefehle nach Gebäudeeinstürzen in der Türkei
ref: Arrest warrants after building collapses in Turkey
draft_translation: Warrants after building collapses in Turkey
final_translation: Arrest warrants after building collapses in Turkey

src: Es geht um Baumängel, die den Einsturz von Gebäuden begünstigt haben: In der türkischen Erdbebenregion haben die Justizbehörden Haftbefehl gegen Dutzende Verdächtige erlassen.
ref: It is about construction defects that contributed to the collapse of buildings: In the Turkish earthquake region, judicial authorities have issued arrest warrants for dozens of suspects.
draft_translation: The issue is about tree defects that have favored the collapse of buildings: In the Turkish earthquake region, judicial authorities have issued arrest warrants against dozens of suspects.
final_translation: The issue is tree defects that have favored the collapse of buildings: In the Turkish earthquake region, judicial authorities have issued arrest warrants against dozens of suspects.

src: Istanbul. Im Süden der Türkei sind nach Gebäudeeinstürzen während des Erdbebens Dutzende Haftbefehle wegen möglicher Baumängel erlassen worden. In der Stadt Diyarbakir seien gegen 33 Menschen Haftbefehle ergangen, berichtete die staatliche Nachrichtenagentur Anadolu am Samstag unter Berufung auf Strafverfolger. Die Beschuldigten sollen für Baumängel verantwortlich sein, die den Einsturz der Gebäude begünstigt hätten.
ref: Istanbul. Dozens of arrest warrants have been issued in southern Turkey for possible construction defects following the collapse of buildings during an earthquake. In the city of Diyarbakir, arrest warrants have been issued to 33 people, the state-run Anadolu news agency reported Saturday, citing prosecutors. The accused are believed to be responsible for construction defects that may have contributed to the collapse of the buildings.
draft_translation: Istanbul. In the south of Turkey, dozens of arrest warrants have been issued for possible building defects following the collapse of buildings during the earthquake. In the city of Diyarbakir, about 33 people have been arrested, reported state news agency Anadolu on Saturday, citing prosecutors. The accused are said to be responsible for building defects that may have contributed to the collapse of the buildings.
final_translation: Istanbul. In the south of Turkey, dozens of arrest warrants have been issued for possible building defects following the collapse of buildings during the earthquake. In the city of Diyarbakir, about 33 people have been arrested, reported state news agency Anadolu on Saturday, citing prosecutors. The accused are said to be responsible for building defects that may have contributed to the collapse of the buildings.

src: Die Staatsanwaltschaft in Adana ermittelt laut Anadolu ebenfalls wegen möglicher Baumängel bei eingestürzten Gebäuden. Im Rahmen dieser Ermittlungen seien bisher 62 Haftbefehle erlassen worden, hieß es. Einer der Beschuldigten wurde den Angaben zufolge am Flughafen in Istanbul gefasst. Er soll versucht haben, mit Bargeld nach Montenegro zu reisen und sitze inzwischen in Untersuchungshaft, teilte Anadolu mit. Neun weitere Menschen wurden demnach in den Städten Sanliurfa und Osmaniye verhaftet.
ref: The public prosecutor's office in Adana is also investigating possible construction defects in collapsed buildings, according to Anadolu. Sixty-two arrest warrants have been issued so far as part of these investigations, it said. One of the suspects was reportedly caught at the airport in Istanbul. He allegedly tried to travel to Montenegro with cash and is now in custody, Anadolu reported. Nine other people were arrested in the cities of Sanliurfa and Osmaniye, according to the report.
draft_translation: The prosecutor's office in Adana is also investigating, according to Anadolu, for possible building defects in collapsed buildings. As part of these investigations, 62 arrest warrants have been issued so far, it was stated. One of the accused was arrested at the Istanbul airport, according to the statements. He is alleged to have tried to travel to Montenegro with cash and is now in custody under investigation, Anadolu reported. Nine other people were arrested in the cities of Sanliurfa and Osmaniye.
final_translation: The prosecutor's office in Adana is also investigating, according to Anadolu, for possible building defects in collapsed buildings. As part of these investigations, 62 arrest warrants have been issued so far, it said. One of the accused was arrested at the Istanbul airport, according to Anadolu. He is alleged to have tried to travel to Montenegro with cash and is now in custody under investigation, Anadolu reported. Nine other people were arrested in the cities of Sanliurfa and Osmaniye.

src: Am frühen Montagmorgen hatte ein Beben der Stärke 7,7 das türkisch-syrische Grenzgebiet erschüttert, gefolgt von einem weiteren Beben der Stärke 7,6 am Mittag. Mehr als 7500 Gebäude sind dabei allein in der Türkei eingestürzt.
ref: Early Monday morning, a 7.7-magnitude earthquake hit the Turkish-Syrian border region, followed by another of 7.6-magnitude quake at midday. More than 7,500 buildings collapsed in Turkey alone.
draft_translation: On the early Monday morning, an earthquake of magnitude 7.7 shook the Turkish-Syrian border, followed by another earthquake of magnitude 7.6 in the afternoon. More than 7,500 buildings collapsed alone in Turkey.
final_translation: On the early Monday morning, an earthquake of magnitude 7.7 shook the Turkish-Syrian border, followed by another earthquake of magnitude 7.6 in the afternoon. More than 7,500 buildings collapsed alone in Turkey.

src: Vorletzter Ministerpräsident der DDR Hans Modrow gestorben
ref: Hans Modrow, second-last Minister-President of the GDR, has died
draft_translation: Hans Modrow, the last Minister-President of the GDR, has died
final_translation: Hans Modrow, the penultimate Minister-President of the GDR, has died

src: Hans Modrow ist tot, wie die Linksfraktion im Bundestag mitteilte. Der 95-Jährige sei in der Nacht zum Samstag gestorben. Fraktionsvorsitzende Dietmar Bartsch würdigte den ehemaligen SED-Funktionär und späteren PDS- und Linke-Politiker als einen "zutiefst aufrichtigen Sozialisten".
ref: Hans Modrow is dead, as the Left Party in the Bundestag has announced. The 95-year-old passed away on Saturday night. Parliamentary group chairman Dietmar Bartsch paid tribute to the former SED official and later PDS and Left Party politician as a "deeply sincere socialist."
draft_translation: Hans Modrow is dead, as the Left faction in the Bundestag announced. The 95-year-old died overnight Saturday. Faction leader Dietmar Bartsch honored the former SED official and later PDS and Left politician as a "deeply sincere socialist."
final_translation: Hans Modrow is dead, as the Left faction in the Bundestag announced. The 95-year-old died on Saturday night. Faction leader Dietmar Bartsch honored the former SED official and later PDS and Left politician as a "deeply sincere socialist."

src: Letzte Nacht sei "Hans Modrow mit 95 Jahren von uns gegangen", teilte die Linksfraktion im Bundestag am Samstag mit. Die Partei verliere damit "eine bedeutende Persönlichkeit", erklärten der Fraktionsvorsitzende Dietmar Bartsch und der frühere Fraktionschef Gregor Gysi.
ref: Last night, "Hans Modrow departed from us at the age of 95," the left-wing parliamentary group in the Bundestag announced on Saturday. The party has lost "an important personality," said Dietmar Bartsch, chairman of the parliamentary group, and Gregor Gysi, former parliamentary group leader.
draft_translation: Last night, the Left Party announced in the Bundestag on Saturday that "Hans Modrow passed away at the age of 95." The party loses "a significant personality," said faction leader Dietmar Bartsch and former faction chief Gregor Gysi.
final_translation: Last night, the Left Party announced in the Bundestag on Saturday that "Hans Modrow passed away at the age of 95." The party loses "a significant personality," said faction leader Dietmar Bartsch and former faction chief Gregor Gysi.

src: In den 1970er Jahren wurde Hans Modrow der 1. Sekretär der Bezirksleitung der SED in Dresden. Als Ministerpräsident begleitete er das Ende der DDR. Nur vier Tage nach dem Fall der Mauer, am 13. November 1989, wurde er zum Vorsitzenden des Ministerrates der DDR - für rund 150 Tage. Bei den Volkskammerwahlen am 18. März 1990 verlor die SED/PDS die Macht und Modrow einen Monat später sein Amt. Ihm folgte als letzter Ministerpräsident der DDR bis zur Wiedervereinigung der CDU-Politiker Lothar de Maizière.
ref: In the 1970s, Hans Modrow became the first secretary of the SED district leadership in Dresden. As Minister-President, he ushered in the end of the GDR. Just four days after the fall of the Wall, on November 13th, 1989, he became chairman of the GDR's Council of Ministers - for about 150 days. In the Volkskammer elections on March 18th, 1990, the SED/PDS lost power and Modrow his office a month later. He was succeeded as the GDR's last Minister-President until reunification by CDU politician Lothar de Maizière.
draft_translation: Hans Modrow was the first secretary of the district leadership of the SED in Dresden in the 1970s. As Minister-President, he accompanied the end of the GDR. Only four days after the fall of the Wall, on November 13, 1989, he was appointed President of the Ministry Council of the GDR – for about 150 days. At the People's Chamber elections on March 18, 1990, the SED/PDS lost power, and Modrow lost his position a month later. He was succeeded as the last Minister-President of the GDR until reunification by the CDU politician Lothar de Maizière.
final_translation: Hans Modrow was the first secretary of the district leadership of the SED in Dresden in the 1970s. As Minister-President, he accompanied the end of the GDR. Only four days after the fall of the Wall, on November 13, 1989, he was appointed Chairman of the Ministry Council of the GDR – for about 150 days. At the People's Chamber elections on March 18, 1990, the SED/PDS lost power, and Modrow lost his position a month later. He was succeeded as the last Minister-President of the GDR until reunification by the CDU politician Lothar de Maizière.

src: Der Fraktionsvorsitzende der Linken, Dietmar Bartsch, beschrieb Modrow in einer Nachricht auf dem Kurznachrichtendienst Twitter als einen "zutiefst aufrichtigen und kämpferischen Sozialisten". Bartsch ergänzte:
ref: Dietmar Bartsch, the parliamentary group leader of the Left Party, described Modrow as a "deeply sincere and combative socialist" in a message on the social media service Twitter. Bartsch added:
draft_translation: The faction leader of the Left, Dietmar Bartsch, described Modrow as "a deeply sincere and fighting socialist" on a message on the short-message service Twitter. Bartsch added:
final_translation: The faction leader of the Left, Dietmar Bartsch, described Modrow as "a deeply sincere and fighting socialist" on a message on the text service Twitter. Bartsch added:

src: "Bis ins hohe Alter war er ein wichtiger Ratgeber in unserer Partei, dessen Klugheit fehlen wird".
ref: "He was an important advisor in our party into his old age, and his wisdom will be missed."
draft_translation: He remained an important advisor in our party until a high age, whose wisdom will be missed.
final_translation: He remained an important advisor in our party until old age, whose wisdom will be missed.

src: "Der gesamte friedliche Verlauf der Herstellung der deutschen Einheit war gerade ein besonderes Verdienst von ihm. Das wird sein politisches Vermächtnis bleiben", schrieben Bartsch und Gysi in ihrem Nachruf. Weiter heißt es:
ref: "The entire peaceful process to achieving German unity was a very special merit of his. That will remain his political legacy," Bartsch and Gysi wrote in their obituary. It continues:
draft_translation: The entire peaceful course of the creation of the German unity was precisely a particular achievement of him. This will remain his political legacy," wrote Bartsch and Gysi in their obituary. Further it is stated:
final_translation: The entire peaceful process of the creation of the German unity was exactly a special achievement of him. This will remain his political legacy," wrote Bartsch and Gysi in their obituary. Further it is noted:

src: "Sein späteres Wirken in der Volkskammer, im Bundestag, im Europäischen Parlament und als Ehrenvorsitzender der PDS bestand immer darin, auch jenen Teil der früheren DDR-Bevölkerung zu vertreten, der nicht gewollt war und dessen Interessen regelmäßig verletzt wurden".
ref: "His later work in the People's Chamber, in the Bundestag, in the European Parliament and as honorary chairman of the PDS also always consisted of representing every part of the former GDR population that was unwanted and whose interests were regularly violated."
draft_translation: His later work in the People's Chamber, the Bundestag, the European Parliament, and as honorary chairman of the PDS always consisted of representing those parts of the former East German population who were not wanted and whose interests were regularly violated.
final_translation: His later work in the People's Chamber, the Bundestag, the European Parliament, and as honorary chairman of the PDS always consisted of representing those parts of the former East German population who were not desired and whose interests were regularly violated.

src: Nach der Wiedervereinigung saß Modrow in den Jahren 1990 bis 1994 für die PDS im Deutschen Bundestag und vertrat sie von 1999 bis 2004 im Europaparlament.
ref: After reunification, Modrow sat in the German Bundestag for the PDS from 1990 to 1994 and represented it in the European Parliament from 1999 to 2004.
draft_translation: After the reunification, Modrow sat in the German Bundestag for the PDS from 1990 to 1994 and represented it in the European Parliament from 1999 to 2004.
final_translation: After the reunification, Modrow sat in the German Bundestag for the PDS from 1990 to 1994 and represented it in the European Parliament from 1999 to 2004.

src: Wie es in einem Bericht der Deutschen Presse-Agentur (dpa) heißt, habe Modrow den neuen Staat "durchaus kritisch" gesehen. Zu schnell sei die deutsche Einheit vollzogen worden, zu bedingungslos sei die DDR untergegangen, und zu einseitig sei sie als "Unrechtsstaat" verdammt worden, habe Modrow laut dpa in vielen Interviews kritisiert.
ref: According to a report by the Deutsche Presse-Agentur (dpa), Modrow had taken a "thoroughly critical" view of the new state. German unity had been achieved too quickly, the GDR had gone down too unconditionally, and it had been condemned too one-sidedly as an "unjust state," Modrow stated in many interviews, according to the dpa.
draft_translation: As reported in a statement by the German Press Agency (dpa), Modrow viewed the new state "rather critically." He criticized that the unification of Germany had been too rapid, that the GDR had fallen too easily, and that it had been too one-sidedly condemned as an "authoritarian state," according to dpa, in many of his interviews.

src: Was in der Nacht passiert ist
ref: What happened at night
draft_translation: What happened at night
final_translation: What happened at night

src: Ukraines Präsident Wolodomyr Selenskyj verurteilt russische Raketenangriffe. Indes muss Kiew Notreparaturen am Stromnetz durchführen.
ref: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy condemns Russian missile strikes. Meanwhile, Kyiv must carry out emergency repairs to the power grid.
draft_translation: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy condemns Russian rocket attacks. However, Kyiv must carry out repairs on the power grid.
final_translation: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy condemns Russian rocket attacks. However, Kyiv must carry out repairs on the power grid.

src: Kiew - Die jüngste Welle russischer Raketenangriffe erzwingt erneut Notreparaturen am ukrainischen Energienetz. Doch auch die Ukraine greift russische Stellungen an. Mehrere Wärme- und Wasserkraftwerke seien beschädigt worden, sagte der Chef des Energieversorgers Ukrenerho, Wolodymyr Kudryzkyj, am Freitagabend im ukrainischen Fernsehen. Besonders schlecht sehe es mit der Stromversorgung im Gebiet Charkiw aus. Wegen der Instabilität im ukrainischen Stromnetz musste am AKW Chmelnyzkyj ein Reaktorblock abgeschaltet werden, in den Kernkraftwerken Riwne und Südukraine wurde die Produktion gedrosselt.
ref: Kyiv - The latest wave of Russian missile strikes is again forcing emergency repairs to Ukraine's power grid. But Ukraine is also attacking Russian positions. Several thermal and hydroelectric power plants have been damaged, the head of the Ukrenergo power company, Volodymyr Kudrytskyi, said on Ukrainian television Friday evening. He disclosed that the power supply was particularly bad in the Kharkiv region. Due to the instability in the Ukrainian power grid, a reactor unit had to be shut down at the Khmelnytskyi Nuclear Power Plant, and production was cut at the Rivne and South Ukraine Nuclear Power Plants.
draft_translation: Kyiv - The latest wave of Russian rocket attacks once again requires emergency repairs to the Ukrainian energy network. However, the Ukraine is also attacking Russian positions. Several thermal and hydroelectric power plants have been damaged, said the head of the energy supplier Ukrenergo, Volodymyr Kudryzhyj, on Friday evening on Ukrainian television. Particularly bad is the power supply in the Charkiv region. Due to the instability in the Ukrainian power grid, a reactor block at the Chmelnyzkyj nuclear power plant had to be shut down, and production was reduced at the Rivne and Southern Ukraine nuclear power plants.
final_translation: Kyiv - The latest wave of Russian rocket attacks once again requires emergency repairs to the Ukrainian energy network. However, the Ukraine is also attacking Russian positions. Several thermal and hydroelectric power plants have been damaged, said the head of the energy supplier Ukrenergo, Volodymyr Kudryzhyj, on Friday evening on Ukrainian television. Particularly bad is the power supply in the Charkiv region. Due to the instability in the Ukrainian power grid, a reactor block at the Chmelnyzkyj nuclear power plant had to be shut down, and production was reduced at the Rivne and Southern Ukraine nuclear power plants.

src: Präsident Wolodymyr Selenskyj verurteilte den russischen Angriff mit etwa 100 Raketen und Marschflugkörpern vom Freitag als Terror. In einer Videobotschaft berichtete er aber seinen Landsleuten, wie viel Unterstützung die Ukraine bei seiner Reise nach London, Paris und Brüssel in dieser Woche erfahren habe.
ref: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy condemned Friday's Russian attack using some 100 missiles and cruise missiles as terror. However, he told his compatriots in a video message how much support Ukraine had received during his trip to London, Paris, and Brussels this week.
draft_translation: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy condemned the Russian attack with about 100 rockets and cruise missiles launched on Friday as terrorism. In a video message, he however reported to his compatriots how much support the Ukraine has received during this week on his journey to London, Paris, and Brussels.
final_translation: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy condemned the Russian attack with about 100 rockets and cruise missiles launched on Friday as terrorism. In a video message, he however reported to his compatriots how much support the Ukraine has received during this week on his journey to London, Paris, and Brussels.

src: Selenskyj will die Kleinstadt Bachmut nicht im Stich lassen
ref: Zelenskyy doesn't want to abandon the small town of Bachmut
draft_translation: Selenskyj will not abandon the small town of Bachmut
final_translation: Zelenskyj will not abandon the small town of Bachmut

src: Am 24. Februar wird seit einem Jahr Krieg herrschen. US-Präsident Joe Biden kündigte einen Besuch beim wichtigen Ukraine-Unterstützer Polen kurz vor dem Jahrestag an. Die Gefahr durch russische Raketenangriffe dauerte indes auch in der Nacht zu Samstag an. In der Hauptstadt Kiew wurde am späten Freitagabend zum fünften Mal für diesen Tag Luftalarm ausgelöst. "Es droht ein Angriff mit Drohnen", teilte die Militärverwaltung des Kiewer Gebietes mit. Kampfdrohnen iranischer Bauart wurden auch über den Gebieten Mykolajiw und Odessa im Süden gesichtet und abgeschossen.
ref: February 24th will mark one year of the war. U.S. President Joe Biden announced a visit to key Ukraine supporter Poland shortly before the anniversary. Meanwhile, the threat of Russian missile strikes continued into Saturday night. An air alert was sounded in the capital Kyiv late Friday night for the fifth time that day. "There is a threat of a drone attack," the military administration of the Kyiv region announced. Iranian-made combat drones were also spotted and shot down over the Mykolaiv and Odessa regions in the south.
draft_translation: On February 24th, a year of war will have been ongoing. US President Joe Biden announced a visit to Poland, an important supporter of Ukraine, shortly before the anniversary. The threat from Russian rocket attacks continued even into the night. In the capital Kyiv, a air raid alarm was sounded for the fifth time that day in the late Friday evening. "There is a threat of drone attack," said the military administration of the Kyiv region. Iranian-made combat drones were also spotted over the areas of Mykolajiv and Odessa in the south and shot down.
final_translation: On February 24th, a year of war has been ongoing. US President Joe Biden announced a visit to Poland, an important supporter of Ukraine, shortly before the anniversary. The threat from Russian rocket attacks continued even into the night. In the capital Kyiv, an air raid alarm was sounded for the fifth time that day in the late Friday evening. "There is a threat of a drone attack," said the military administration of the Kyiv region. Iranian-made combat drones were also spotted over the areas of Mykolajiv and Odessa in the south and shot down.

src: Deutsche Bahn: Bund wählt Berater für Netzgesellschaft aus
ref: Deutsche Bahn: federal government selects consultant for network company
draft_translation: Deutsche Bahn: The government selects advisors for the network company
final_translation: Deutsche Bahn: The government selects advisors for the network company

src: Forderungen unter anderem der FDP und der Grünen aus dem Wahlkampf, diese abzuspalten, scheiterten am Koalitionspartner SPD. Im Koalitionsvertrag hatte man sich auf den Kompromiss einer Infrastrukturgesellschaft geeinigt, die allerdings künftig gemeinwohlorientiert sein soll. Das heißt, sie braucht keine Gewinne zu erwirtschaften und abzuführen.
ref: Calls from parties including the FDP and the Greens for them to split during the election campaign failed due to coalition partner SPD. In the coalition agreement, a compromise was reached on an infrastructure company that would, however, be focused on the common good in the future. This means that it doesn't have to generate and transfer profits.
draft_translation: The demands of the FDP and the Greens from the campaign, to separate them, failed because of the coalition partner SPD. In the coalition agreement, a compromise had been reached to establish an infrastructure company, which however should be oriented towards the public good. This means it should not make profits and therefore should not earn or distribute them.
final_translation: The demands from the campaign by the FDP and the Greens to isolate them failed due to the coalition partner SPD. In the coalition agreement, a compromise had been reached to establish an infrastructure company, which however should be oriented towards the public good. This means it should not generate or distribute profits.

src: Sanierungsstau von 80 Milliarden Euro
ref: Renovation backlog of 80 billion euros
draft_translation: Sanierungsschulden von 80 Milliarden Euro
final_translation: Sanierungsstau of 80 billion euros

src: Die beiden Beratungsfirmen sollen dem Bund dabei helfen, diesen Prozess zu begleiten. Der Sanierungsstau beim Schienennetz ist ein wesentlicher Grund, warum die Bahn derzeit sehr unpünktlich verkehrt. Verkehrsminister Wissing hat sich zur Aufgabe gemacht, mit der Komplettsanierung ganzer Bahnkorridore diesen Missstand zu beseitigen. Die Investitionen, die dafür notwendig sind, wurden bislang auf 50 Milliarden Euro geschätzt. Nach neueren Berechnungen der Bahn liegen sie aber eher bei bis zu 80 Milliarden Euro.
ref: The two consulting firms are to help the federal government navigate this process. The renovation backlog of the rail network is a major reason why the railroads are currently not very punctual. Transport Minister Wissing has set himself the task of eliminating this deplorable state of affairs by completely refurbishing entire rail corridors. The investment required for this has so far been estimated at 50 billion euros. Based on recent calculations by Deutsche Bahn, however, the figure is closer to 80 billion euros.
draft_translation: The two consulting firms are supposed to help the federal government with this process. The backlog in the rail network is a major reason why the railway is currently running very late. Transport Minister Wissing has taken on the task of eliminating this problem by fully renovating entire railway corridors. The investments required for this have been estimated at 50 billion euros so far. However, according to more recent calculations by the railway, they are actually around 80 billion euros.
final_translation: The two consulting firms are supposed to help the federal government with this process. The backlog in the rail network is a major reason why the railway is currently running very late. Transport Minister Wissing has taken on the task of eliminating this problem by fully renovating entire railway corridors. The investments required for this have been estimated at 50 billion euros so far. However, according to more recent calculations by the railway, they are actually around 80 billion euros.

src: Biathlon-WM in Oberhof 2023 - Gold für Denise Herrmann-Wick: "Kann mich bitte jemand kneifen?"
ref: Biathlon World Championships in Oberhof 2023 - Gold for Denise Herrmann-Wick: "Can someone please pinch me?"
draft_translation: Biathlon World Championships in Oberhof 2023 - Gold for Denise Herrmann-Wick: "Can someone please pat me?"
final_translation: Biathlon World Championships in Oberhof 2023 - Gold for Denise Herrmann-Wick: "Can someone please pat me?"

src: Dabei hatten die äußeren Umstände augenscheinlich gar nicht für Herrmann-Wick gesprochen. Sie hätte schlecht geschlafen, erzählte sie nach dem Rennen, sei "total aufgeregt" gewesen, der Puls schon beim Einlaufen nicht mehr heruntergekommen. "So ein Rennen", und das bei der Heim-WM, "das kann man mit Worten nicht beschreiben", sagte sie. 11.000 Zuschauer johlten zur dröhnenden Schlagermusik mit Deutschlandfahnen, Betreuer und Team fielen sich in die Arme.
ref: The external conditions had apparently not been in Herrmann-Wick's favor. She said after the race that she had slept badly, had been "very nervous," and her pulse rate hadn't come down afterwards. "Such a race," and at the home World Championships here at home, "there are no words to describe it," she said. Eleven thousand spectators cheered to booming pop music with German flags, while the coaches and team hugged each other.
draft_translation: At that time, the external circumstances clearly did not favor Herrmann-Wick. She said after the race that she had slept badly, had been "completely excited," and that her pulse hadn't settled even during the entry. "Such a race," and especially at the home World Championship, "one can't describe it with words," she said. 11,000 spectators cheered to the booming rock music with German flags, coaches and team members embraced each other.
final_translation: At that time, the external circumstances clearly did not favor Herrmann-Wick. She said after the race that she had slept badly, had been "completely excited," and that her pulse hadn't settled even during the entry. "Such a race," and especially at the home World Championship, "one can't describe it with words," she said. 11,000 spectators cheered to the booming rock music with German flags, coaches and team members embraced each other.

src: "Biathlon genießen", das hatte sie sich vorgenommen
ref: "Enjoy the biathlon" – that's what she had in mind
draft_translation: Savoring biathlon, that was something she had planned
final_translation: Enjoying biathlon, that was her plan.

src: Für Herrmann-Wick war der Druck besonders hoch gewesen. Die 34-Jährige war als größte, wenn nicht gar einzige deutsche Medaillenhoffnung abseits der Staffeln in die Weltmeisterschaft gestartet. Herrmann-Wick hat in diesem Winter als einzige Deutsche zwei Weltcups gewonnen. Im Gesamt-Weltcup belegt sie derzeit Platz fünf. Und auch wenn die Leistungsdichte bei den Frauen in der Spitze deutlich höher ist, als bei den Männern, wo derzeit nur Johannes Thingnes Bø und seine Norweger dominieren, hatte man für diesen Sprintsieg doch eher andere auf dem Zettel.
ref: For Herrmann-Wick, the pressure had been particularly high. The 34-year-old had started the World Championship as Germany's biggest, if not only, medal hope barring the relays. Herrmann-Wick is the only German to have won two World Cups this winter. She is currently ranked fifth in the overall World Cup. And even if the performance level among women at the top is significantly higher than in the men's, where only Johannes Thingnes Bø and his Norwegians dominate at the moment, one would have had predicted others for this sprint victory.
draft_translation: The pressure was particularly high for Herrmann-Wick. The 34-year-old was the biggest, if not the only, German medal hope outside of the relays to compete in the world championships. Herrmann-Wick won two world cups this winter as the only German. She currently holds fifth place in the overall world cup. And even though the performance level of the women in the top ranks is significantly higher than that of the men, where currently only Johannes Thingnes Bø and his Norwegian team dominate, there were other candidates on the list for this sprint victory.
final_translation: The pressure was particularly high for Herrmann-Wick. The 34-year-old was the biggest, if not the only, German medal hope outside the relays to compete in the world championships. Herrmann-Wick won two world cups this winter as the only German. She currently holds fifth place in the overall world cup. Even though the performance level of the women in the top ranks is significantly higher than that of the men, where only Johannes Thingnes Bø and his Norwegian team dominate, there were other candidates for this sprint victory.

src: Kritik an der Regierung - Bischof in Nicaragua zu 26 Jahren Haft verurteilt
ref: Criticism of the government - Bishop in Nicaragua sentenced to 26 years in prison
draft_translation: Criticism of the government - Bishop in Nicaragua sentenced to 26 years in prison
final_translation: Criticism of the government - Bishop in Nicaragua sentenced to 26 years in prison

src: Der Bischof ist ein prominenter Kritiker des linksgerichteten Staatschefs. Er wirft Ortega vor, die Religionsfreiheit zu unterdrücken. Die Beziehungen zwischen der nicaraguanischen Regierung und der katholischen Kirche sind seit 2018 stark angespannt. Damals hatten Demonstranten, die den Rücktritt Ortegas forderten, Zuflucht in Kirchen gefunden. Bei den Protesten waren 2018 mehr als 350 Menschen ums Leben gekommen. Tausende Menschen verließen in den folgenden Jahren das mittelamerikanische Land, oft aus Furcht vor Repressionen oder Verhaftungen. Präsident Ortega wirft dem katholischen Klerus vor, zusammen mit der US-Regierung ein Komplott zu seinem Sturz zu schmieden.
ref: The bishop is a prominent critic of the leftist head of state. He accuses Ortega of suppressing religious freedom. Relations between the Nicaraguan government and the Catholic Church have been severely strained since 2018. At that time, demonstrators demanding Ortega's resignation had found refuge in churches. More than 350 people died during the protests in 2018. Thousands of people left the Central American country in the following years, often out of fear of repression or arrest. President Ortega accuses the Catholic clergy of plotting with the US government to overthrow him.
draft_translation: The bishop is a prominent critic of the left-leaning president. He accuses Ortega of suppressing religious freedom. Relations between the Nicaraguan government and the Catholic Church have been highly tense since 2018. At that time, demonstrators demanding Ortega's resignation found refuge in churches. More than 350 people died in the protests in 2018. Thousands of people left the Central American country in the following years, often out of fear of repression or arrest. President Ortega accuses the Catholic clergy of conspiring with the U.S. government to bring about his downfall.
final_translation: The bishop is a prominent critic of the left-leaning president. He accuses Ortega of suppressing religious freedom. Relations between the Nicaraguan government and the Catholic Church have been highly tense since 2018. At that time, demonstrators demanding Ortega's resignation found refuge in churches. More than 350 people died in the protests in 2018. Thousands of people left the Central American country in the following years, often out of fear of repression or arrest. President Ortega accuses the Catholic clergy of conspiring with the U.S. government to bring about his downfall.

src: Bundeswehr: Rüstungsindustrie fordert mehr Aufträge aus Sondervermögen ein
ref: Bundeswehr: Defense industry demands more orders from special funds
draft_translation: Bundeswehr: Defense industry demands more contracts from special funds
final_translation: Bundeswehr: Defense industry demands more orders from special funds

src: Erste Rüstungsprojekte sind deshalb schon gestrichen worden, weiteren Vorhaben droht dasselbe, wie die "Welt am Sonntag" berichtet. Welche Investitionen konkret wegfallen würden, könne derzeit aber noch nicht gesagt werden. "Es besteht keine Notwendigkeit, bereits zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt einem eventuellen Einsparungsbedarf konkrete Beschaffungsmaßnahmen zuzuordnen", heißt es in einer Antwort der Bundesregierung auf eine Anfrage des Bundestagsabgeordneten Ingo Gädechens (CDU).
ref: As a result, the first defense projects have already been canceled, and further projects are threatened with the same, as reported by "Welt am Sonntag." However, it is not yet possible to say which specific investments will be cancelled. "There is no need to assign specific procurement measures to a possible savings requirement at this stage," a response from the German government to a question from Bundestag member Ingo Gädechens (CDU) stated.
draft_translation: First defense projects have already been canceled for this reason, and further plans are also at risk, as reported by "Die Welt am Sonntag." It cannot be stated yet which investments would be lost. "There is no necessity, at this current time, to associate potential cost-saving needs with specific procurement measures," says the federal government's response to a question from Bundestag member Ingo Gädechens (CDU).
final_translation: Initial defense projects have been canceled for this reason, and further plans are also at risk, as reported by "Die Welt am Sonntag." It cannot be stated at this time which investments would fall through. "There is no necessity, at this current time, to associate potential cost-saving needs with specific procurement measures," says the federal government's response to a question from Bundestag member Ingo Gädechens (CDU).

src: Hintergrund der sinkenden Investitionssumme sind die steigenden Zinsen. Das vollständig kreditfinanzierte Sondervermögen, das der Bundestag im Juni 2022 beschlossen hatte, muss die Zinslasten für die Kredite selbst tragen. Steigen diese, steht also weniger Geld für die konkreten Anschaffungen für die Bundeswehr zur Verfügung. Hinzu kommt, dass durch die derzeit hohe Inflation die Kaufkraft der verbliebenen Summe sinkt.
ref: The background to the falling investment amount is rising interest rates. The fully credit-financed special fund, which the Bundestag approved in June 2022, has to bear the interest charges for the loans itself. If these rise, less money will be available for concrete acquisitions for the Bundeswehr. In addition, the current high inflation is reducing the purchasing power of the remaining amount.
draft_translation: The reason for the decrease in the investment amount is the rising interest rates. The fully credit-financed special fund, which the Bundestag approved in June 2022, must bear the interest costs for the loans themselves. If these rates rise, less money is available for the specific purchases required by the Bundeswehr. Additionally, the purchasing power of the remaining amount is currently decreasing due to the high inflation rate.
final_translation: The reason for the decrease in the investment amount is the rising interest rates. The fully credit-financed special fund, which the Bundestag approved in June 2022, must bear the interest costs for the loans themselves. If these rates rise, less money is available for the specific purchases required by the Bundeswehr. Additionally, the purchasing power of the remaining amount is currently decreasing due to the high inflation rate.

src: Kupferzell: Unfall mit 3 Verletzten
ref: Kupferzell: Accident injures three
draft_translation: Copperzell: Accident with 3 injured
final_translation: Copperzell: Red accident with 3 injured

src: In der Nacht von Freitag auf Samstag (10.02.-11.02.), gegen 01.40 Uhr, wollte ein 24-jähriger BMW-Fahrer, aus Richtung Kupferzell kommend, an der Autobahnauffahrt Kupferzell nach links in Richtung Heilbronn auf die Autobahn fahren. Zu diesem Zeitpunkt befuhr eine 21-jährige VW-Fahrerin die B 19 in Richtung Künzelsau, wie die Polizei mitteilte. Beim Abbiegevorgang des BMW-Fahrers kam es zu einem Zusammenstoß zwischen den beiden Fahrzeugen.
ref: In the night from Friday to Saturday (10.02.-11.02.), around 1:40 a.m., a 24-year-old driver of a BMW, coming from the direction of Kupferzell, wanted to turn left onto the Autobahn at the Kupferzell Autobahn ramp in the direction of Heilbronn. At that time, a 21-year-old female driver of a VW was traveling on the B19 in the direction of Künzelsau, according to police. When the BMW driver turned, the two vehicles collided.
draft_translation: In the night between Friday and Saturday (10.02.-11.02.), around 01:40 AM, a 24-year-old BMW driver, coming from Kupferzell, wanted to turn left towards Heilbronn at the Kupferzell exit onto the motorway. At that time, a 21-year-old VW driver was driving the B 19 towards Künzelsau, as reported by the police. During the BMW driver's turn, a collision between the two vehicles occurred.
final_translation: In the night between Friday and Saturday (10.02.-11.02.), around 01:40 AM, a 24-year-old BMW driver, coming from Kupferzell, wanted to turn left towards Heilbronn at the Kupferzell exit onto the motorway. At that time, a 21-year-old VW driver was on the B 19 heading towards Künzelsau, as reported by the police. During the BMW driver's attempt to turn left, a collision between the two vehicles occurred.

src: Beide Unfallbeteiligten gaben an, dass die am Unfallort installierte Ampelanlage für sie "grün" zeigte. Eine Überprüfung der Ampelanlage ergab keine Beanstandung. Weitere Ermittlungen folgen. Bei dem Unfall wurden der 24-Jährige, die 21-Jährige sowie der Beifahrer in dem BMW jeweils leicht verletzt. Sie mussten in ein Krankenhaus eingeliefert werden. An den beiden Autos entstand ein Sachschaden von insgesamt circa 20.000 Euro.
ref: Both drivers involved in the accident stated that the traffic lights installed at the scene of the accident showed "green" for them. A check of the traffic light system did not reveal any objections. Further investigations will follow. The 24-year-old, the 21-year-old and the passenger in the BMW were all lightly injured in the accident. They had to be admitted to the hospital. The two cars were damaged to a total of around 20,000 euros.
draft_translation: Both accident participants stated that the traffic light installed at the accident scene showed "green" for them. An inspection of the traffic light revealed no issues. Further investigations are ongoing. At the accident, the 24-year-old, the 21-year-old, and the passenger in the BMW were lightly injured. They were hospitalized. A total of approximately 20,000 euros in damage was caused to both vehicles.

src: Schlossplatz Stuttgarter gedenken der Opfer der Erdbebenkatastrophe
ref: Schlossplatz Stuttgart commemorate the victims of the earthquake disaster
draft_translation: Schlossplatz remembers the victims of the earthquake disaster
final_translation: Schlossplatz Stuttgart honours the victims of the earthquake catastrophe

src: Viele Stuttgarter folgten am Freitagabend dem Aufruf der Feuerbacher Ditib-Moscheegemeinde
ref: Many Stuttgart residents heeded the call of Feuerbach's DITIB mosque community on Friday evening
draft_translation: Many Stuttgart residents followed the call of the Feuerbach Ditib Mosque community on Friday evening
final_translation: Many Stuttgart residents followed the call of the Feuerbach Ditib Mosque Community on Friday evening

src: Zehntausende Menschen sind bei der Erdbebenkatastrophe in der Türkei und in Syrien gestorben. De Anteilnahme ist groß - auch in Stuttgart.
ref: Tens of thousands of people have died in the earthquake disaster in Turkey and Syria. There has been a large outpouring of sympathy - also in Stuttgart.
draft_translation: Tens of thousands of people have died in the earthquake disaster in Turkey and Syria. There is widespread sympathy - also in Stuttgart.
final_translation: Tens of thousands of people have died in the earthquake disaster in Turkey and Syria. There is widespread sympathy - also in Stuttgart.

src: Erdbebenkatastrophe in der Türkei und in Syrien beschäftigt die Welt. Auf dem Stuttgarter Schlossplatz haben am Freitagabend mehr als 200 Menschen der Opfer gedacht und für sie gebetet.
ref: Earthquake disaster in Turkey and Syria preoccupies the world. On Friday evening, more than 200 people remembered the victims and prayed for them at Stuttgart's Schlossplatz.
draft_translation: The earthquake disaster in Turkey and Syria is occupying the world. On Friday evening at the Stuttgart Castle Square, more than 200 people thought of the victims and prayed for them.
final_translation: The earthquake disaster in Turkey and Syria has been occupying the world. On Friday evening at Stuttgart Castle Square, more than 200 people thought of the victims and prayed for them.

src: Viele Gemeindemitglieder waren dem Aufruf der Feuerbacher Ditib-Moscheegemeinde gefolgt, Junge wie Alte, Frauen wie Männer. Sie alle lauschten dem Bittgebet des Imam ernst und schweigend. In dem Gebet bat der Imam Allah um Hilfe für die Menschen in den betroffenen Gebieten, damit sie auch diese Katastrophe überwinden könnten. Er bat unter anderem um Gesundheit, Schutz vor Plagen und um respektvollen Umgang miteinander. Die Gemeinde erbat sich auch Beistand und Kraft, "unsere Hilfe in die vom Erdbeben betroffenen Gebiete zu bringen".
ref: Many members of the community responded to the call of Feuerbach's DITIB mosque community, young and old, women and men. They all listened to the imam's supplication attentively and silently. In the prayer, the imam asked Allah for help for the people in the affected areas, so that they could also overcome the disaster. He asked, among other things, for health, protection from plagues, and respectful interaction with each other. The congregation also asked for assistance and strength to "bring our help to the areas affected by the earthquake."
draft_translation: Many community members followed the call of the Feuerbach Ditib Mosque Community, young and old, women and men. All of them listened seriously and silently to the prayer of the Imam. In the prayer, the Imam asked Allah for help for the people in the affected areas, so that they could also overcome this disaster. He prayed for health, protection from plagues, and for respectful treatment of one another. The community also asked for support and strength, "our help to the areas affected by the earthquake".
final_translation: Many community members followed the call of the Feuerbach Ditib Mosque, young and old, women and men. All of them listened seriously and silently to the prayer of the Imam. In the prayer, the Imam asked Allah for help for the people in the affected areas, so that they could also overcome this disaster. He prayed for health, protection from plagues, and for respectful treatment of one another. The community also asked for support and strength, "our help to the areas affected by the earthquake".

src: Ditib stehe an der Seite der Menschen in der Türkei und in Syrien. Die Sprecher drückten ihr Mitgefühl für die Betroffenen und die Angehörigen der zum Zeitpunkt der Gedenkveranstaltung mehr als 22.000 Opfer aus. Die Bittgebete wurden auf dem Schlossplatz auch auf Deutsch übersetzt.
ref: Ditib stands with the people in Turkey and Syria. The speakers expressed their sympathy for those affected and the relatives of the more than 22,000 victims at the time of the memorial service. The prayers were also translated into German at the Schlossplatz.
draft_translation: Ditib stands at the side of people in Turkey and Syria. The speakers expressed their sympathy for the affected and the relatives of more than 22,000 victims at the time of the commemoration event. The prayers were also translated into German on the palace square.
final_translation: Ditib stands at the side of people in Turkey and Syria. The speakers expressed their sympathy for the affected and the relatives of more than 22,000 victims at the time of the commemoration event. The prayers were also translated into German on the palace square.

src: Die Solidarität der Muslime in Deutschland mit den Erdbebenopfern im türkisch-syrischen Grenzgebiet ist groß. Bei der Spendenaktion des Deutschen Islamverbands Türisch-Islamische Union (Ditib) sind bereits mehrere Millionen Euro zusammengekommen.
ref: There is great solidarity of Muslims in Germany with the earthquake victims in the Turkish-Syrian border region. The fundraising campaign of the Turkish-Islamic Union for Religious Affairs (DITIB) has already raised several million euros.
draft_translation: The solidarity of Muslims in Germany with the earthquake victims in the Turkish-Syrian border region is strong. During the fundraising campaign of the German Islamic Union Turkish-Islamic Union (Ditib), several million euros have already been collected.
final_translation: The solidarity of Muslims in Germany with the earthquake victims in the Turkish-Syrian border region is strong. During the fundraising campaign of the German Islamic Union (Ditib), several million euros have already been collected.

src: Die Alevitische Gemeinde in Stuttgart-Bad Cannstatt hat in der Glockenstraße über mehrere Tage Sachspenden gesammelt, die per Lastwagen in die Erdbebengebiete gebracht werden sollen. Auch dort war die Hilfsbereitschaft überwältigend.
ref: The Alevi community in Stuttgart-Bad Cannstatt collected donations in kind over several days on Glockenstraße, which are to be transported by truck to the earthquake areas. Here, too, the willingness to help was overwhelming.
draft_translation: The Alevite community in Stuttgart-Bad Cannstatt has been collecting donations along the Bell Street over several days, which are intended to be transported by truck to the earthquake-affected areas. There, the willingness to help was overwhelming.
final_translation: The Alevite community in Stuttgart-Bad Cannstatt has been collecting donations along the Glockenstraße over several days, which are meant to be transported by truck to the earthquake-affected areas. There, the willingness to help was overwhelming.

src: Wanderung mit Fleischeinlage - Ebersberg
ref: Hike with meat - Ebersberg
draft_translation: Walking with flesh placement - Ebersberg
final_translation: Walking with a flesh insert - Ebersberg

src: "Nach dem Essen sollst du ruh'n oder tausend Schritte tun ".... Die Älteren kennen das Sprichwort, die Jüngeren setzen es einfach nur in die Praxis um. So oder so hat in den Jahren der Pandemie der gute, alte Verdauungsspaziergang eine ungeahnte Renaissance erfahren. Denn wer dank Home-Office nicht mitten in einer Steinwüste, sondern vielmehr nur einen Steinwurf entfernt von Feld, Wald und Wiese sitzt, nutzt nun die Mittagspause entweder nach dem schnellen Snack vor dem Bildschirm oder gleich ersatzweise für einen Gang an die frische Luft. Zumindest könnte man diesen Eindruck rund um den Egglburger See gewinnen, wo sich zwischen 12 und 14 Uhr längst nicht nur Hundebesitzer tummeln.
ref: "After eating, you should rest or take a thousand steps" .... The older ones know the saying, the younger ones just put it into practice. Either way, in the years of the pandemic, the good old digestive walk has experienced an unexpected renaissance. For those who, thanks to their home office, are not sitting in the middle of a stone desert, but rather just a stone's throw away from fields, forests and meadows, now use their lunch break either after a quick snack in front of the screen or as a substitute for a walk in the fresh air. At least, that's the impression one might get around Lake Egglburg, where it's not just dog owners who are out and about between noon and 2 p.m.
draft_translation: After dinner, you should either rest or take a thousand steps... The older people know this proverb, while the younger ones simply put it into practice. Either way, during the years of the pandemic, the old, reliable digestion walk has experienced an unexpected renaissance. Because whoever, thanks to home office, isn't stuck in a desert but rather only a stone's throw away from fields, forests, and meadows, uses their lunch break either after a quick snack in front of the screen or alternatively for a walk in the fresh air. At least that is the impression you can get around the Egglburger Lake, where between 12 and 2 p.m., it's no longer just dog owners who are around.
final_translation: After dinner, you should either rest or take a thousand steps... The older people know this proverb, while the younger ones simply put it into practice. Either way, during the years of the pandemic, the good, old digestion walk has experienced an unexpected renaissance. Because whoever, thanks to home office, isn't stuck in a desert but rather only a stone's throw away from fields, forests, and meadows, uses their lunch break either after a quick snack in front of the screen or alternatively for a walk in the fresh air. At least that is the impression you can get around the Egglburger See, where between 12 and 2 p.m., it's no longer just dog owners who are around.

src: Ein Grund könnte natürlich auch darin liegen, dass der Mensch der Neuzeit im Zuge einer optimalen Zeitslot-Nutzung die gesundheitsfördernde Frischluftzufuhr mit weiteren Dingen verbinden kann. Denn warum nicht anlässlich eines kurzen Marsches durch die Natur von der lange nicht gesehenen Nachbarin Neuigkeiten aus der Siedlung erfahren? Oder die Freundin treffen, mit der man es abends nie ins Kino schafft, nicht mal ins Alte Kino? Auch ließen sich auf diese Weise Beruf und Privatleben verbinden - wer sagt denn, dass der Termin mit Steuerberaterin, Anwältin oder Anlageberater nicht im Freien stattfinden kann? Sofern keine Fremdohren in der Nähe sind, natürlich.
ref: One reason, of course, could be that modern people, in the course of an optimal use of time slots, can combine the healthy supply of fresh air with other things. After all, why not take a short walk through nature to hear news about the neighborhood from a neighbor you haven't seen in a long time? Or meet the friend whom you have never made it to the cinema with in the evening, not even to the Old Cinema? This is also a good way to combine work and private life - who says that an appointment with a tax advisor, lawyer, or investment advisor can't take place outdoors? Provided there are no eavesdroppers in the vicinity, of course.
draft_translation: A possible reason could also be that the person of the modern age can associate the health-promoting supply of fresh air with other things during optimal time slots. Why not, for example, learn about news from the neighborhood during a short walk in nature from someone who hasn't been seen for a long time? Or meet a friend who you never manage to go to the cinema with, not even to the old cinema? In this way, work and private life could also be connected – who says that a meeting with an accountant, lawyer, or financial advisor cannot take place outdoors? Of course, as long as there are no ears nearby.
final_translation: A possible reason could also be that the human of the modern age can associate the health-promoting supply of fresh air with other things during optimal time slots. Why not, for example, learn about news from the neighborhood during a short walk in nature from someone who hasn't been seen for a long time? Or meet a friend who you never manage to go to the cinema with, not even to the old cinema? In this way, work and private life could also be connected – who says that a meeting with an accountant, lawyer, or financial advisor cannot take place outdoors? Of course, as long as there are no ears nearby.

src: Was man außerdem trefflich erledigen kann, ist der Erwerb von Naturalien. Frisches Obst etwa, das nebst Kässchen auf einem Tisch am Wegesrand steht. Oder Kartoffeln und Fleisch. Dumm nur, wenn man sich den Kauf nicht schon im Vorfeld überlegt und entsprechende Vorkehrungen getroffen hat. So verlässt ein älteres Ehepaar in Hinteregglburg den hölzernen Verkaufsraum des Bauern mit leeren Händen und Bedauern in der Stimme. "Schade, wir haben leider das Geld vergessen".
ref: Another thing that can be done splendidly is purchasing natural products. Fresh fruit, for example, which is on a table on the roadside next to a small box. Or potatoes and meat. Stupid only if you haven't considered the purchase in advance and made appropriate arrangements. That's what happened to an elderly couple in Hinteregglburg who left farmer's wooden shop with empty hands and regret in their voice. "Too bad, we've unfortunately forgotten to bring money."
draft_translation: Additionally, one can do quite well to acquire natural goods. For example, fresh fruit that is placed on a table by the side of the road, along with a basket. Or potatoes and meat. The problem is, if one hasn't already thought about the purchase in advance and made the necessary preparations. So an older couple leaves the wooden sales area of the farmer in Hinteregglburg with empty hands and a voice full of regret. "Sorry, we forgot the money."
final_translation: Additionally, one can effectively acquire natural items. For example, fresh fruit placed on a table by the side of the road, alongside a basket. Or potatoes and meat. The problem is, if one hasn't already planned the purchase in advance and made the necessary preparations. So an older couple leaves the wooden sales booth of the farmer in Hinteregglburg with empty hands and a voice full of regret. "Sorry, we forgot the money."

src: Die Enttäuschung lässt sich nachfühlen, verfügt man doch selbst zwar über einen Begleiter mit Brieftasche, aber nicht über ein Transportbehältnis. Was man die sympathische Zufallsbekanntschaft auch wissen lässt. Worauf der Mann entgegnet: "Das stimmt aber nicht! Sie haben sehr wohl eine Tasche dabei!" Dabei zeigt er auf die Kapuze der Jacke, die man sich vor dem Verlassen des Hauses noch schnell übergeworfen hat, obwohl der Sonnenschein eine zusätzliche Kopfbedeckung überflüssig macht. "Meine Frau packt da immer alles rein!"
ref: You can understand the disappointment, since you too have a companion with a wallet, but no transport container. You also let the friendly chance acquaintance know this. To which the man replies: "But that's not true! You do have a bag with you!" As he does so, he points to the hood of the jacket that has been quickly thrown on before leaving the house, even though the sunshine makes additional headgear unnecessary. "My wife always packs everything in there!"
draft_translation: The disappointment can be felt, for one does have a companion with a wallet, but not a carrying case. It's a kind of random acquaintance. The man replies: "That's not true! You certainly have a bag with you!" He points to the hood of the jacket, which one quickly put on before leaving the house, although the sunlight makes an additional head covering unnecessary. "My wife always puts everything in there!"
final_translation: The disappointment can be felt, for one has a companion with a wallet, but not a carrying case. What one learns from the sympathetic random acquaintance. The man replies: "That's not true! You certainly have a bag with you!" He points to the hood of the jacket, which you quickly put on before leaving the house, although the sunlight makes an additional head covering unnecessary. "My wife always puts everything in there!"

src: Und so geschieht es, dass man den Rückweg mit Fleischeinlage antritt und bei diesem mittäglichen Kurzausflug nicht nur um einen Lammrücken, sondern auch um eine ausgesprochen praktische Idee reicher geworden ist. Gut möglich, dass an diesem Tag ein zweiter Spaziergang fällig wird - nach dem Abendessen. Diesmal tatsächlich zur Verdauung.
ref: And so it happens that you begin your return trip with meat and become all the richer during the short midday excursion, not only by a saddle of lamb, but also by a very practical idea. It's quite possible that a second walk will be necessary that day - after dinner. This time actually for digestion.
draft_translation: And so it happens that one starts the return journey with a meat placement and, on this midday short excursion, one not only gains a lamb back, but also a particularly practical idea. It is quite possible that another walk is due on that day - after dinner. This time truly for digestion.
final_translation: And so it happens that one starts the return journey with a meat placement and, on this midday short trip, one not only gains a lamb's back but also a particularly practical idea. It is quite possible that another walk is due on that day - after dinner. This time for digestion.

src: Eingeklemmt und schwer verletzt
ref: Trapped and badly injured
draft_translation: Trapped and seriously injured
final_translation: Trapped and seriously injured

src: Gegen 21 Uhr fuhr der 25-Jährige mit seinem Audi auf der Kreisstraße Richtung Hailfingen und kam aus bislang ungeklärter Ursache in einer Linkskurve nach rechts von der Fahrbahn ab, so der Polizeibericht. Dabei beschädigte der Audi einen Leitpfosten, prallte seitlich gegen einen Baum und blieb einige Meter entfernt stehen. Durch die Kollision wurde der Fahrer in seinem Auto eingeklemmt. Die Feuerwehr befreite ihn mit schwerem Gerät. Der Rettungsdienst brachte den Schwerverletzten in ein Krankenhaus. Da der Verdacht auf Fahruntüchtigkeit bestand, wurde die Entnahme einer Blutprobe angeordnet. Am Audi entstand laut Polizeibericht Totalschaden in Höhe von 1000 Euro.
ref: At around 9 p.m., the 25-year-old was driving his Audi on Kreisstraße towards Hailfingen and, for as yet unknown reasons, left the road to the right in a left-hand bend, according to the police report. In the process, the Audi damaged a reflector post, crashed into the side of a tree and came to a stop a several meters away. The collision trapped the driver in his car. The fire department freed him using heavy equipment. The rescue service took the seriously injured man to hospital. As there was a suspicion he was unfit to drive, a blood sample was ordered. According to the police report, the Audi suffered a total loss with 1,000 euros' damage.
draft_translation: The 25-year-old drove his Audi on the ring road towards Hailfingen around 9 p.m. and veered off the road to the right in a left turn for an unknown reason, according to the police report. During the incident, the Audi damaged a traffic sign, collided sideways with a tree, and came to a stop several meters away. As a result of the collision, the driver was trapped in his car. The fire department freed him using heavy equipment. The rescue service transported the severely injured person to a hospital. Since there was suspicion of impaired driving, a blood sample was ordered. According to the police report, the Audi sustained total damage amounting to 1,000 euros.
final_translation: The 25-year-old drove his Audi on the ring road toward Hailfingen around 9 p.m. and veered off the road to the right in a left turn for an unknown reason, according to the police report. During the incident, the Audi damaged a traffic post, collided sideways with a tree, and came to a stop several meters away. As a result of the collision, the driver was trapped in his car. The fire department freed him using heavy equipment. The rescue service transported the severely injured person to a hospital. Since there was suspicion of impaired driving, a blood sample was ordered. According to the police report, the Audi sustained total damage amounting to 1,000 euros.

src: Donald Trumps Steuerunterlagen: Punkt für den Rechtsstaat
ref: Donald Trump's tax records: Point in favor of the rule of law
draft_translation: Donald Trump's Tax Returns: A Point for the Rule of Law
final_translation: Donald Trump's Tax Returns: A Point for the Rule of Law

src: Das US-Justizministerium hat entschieden: Die Finanzbehörde muss die Steuererklärungen des Ex-Präsidenten an das Parlament aushändigen.
ref: The U.S. Department of Justice has ruled that the Internal Revenue Service must hand over the former president's tax returns to congress.
draft_translation: The US Department of Justice has decided: The Treasury Department must hand over the tax returns of the former president to the parliament.
final_translation: The US Department of Justice has decided: The Treasury Department must hand over the tax returns of the former president to the parliament.

src: Trump 2018, damals noch im Amt des Präsidenten der USA
ref: Trump in 2018, then still in office as president of the USA
draft_translation: Trump 2018, at that time still serving as President of the United States
final_translation: Trump 2018, still serving as the President of the United States

src: Das Finanzministerium müsse die Steuerbehörde IRS anweisen, die vertraulichen Unterlagen an den Finanz- und Steuerausschuss herauszugeben, hieß es in der Entscheidung Ministeriums vom Freitag.
ref: The Treasury Department must direct the tax authority, IRS, to release the confidential records to the Ways & Means Committee, the department's decision stated on Friday.
draft_translation: The decision from the ministry on Friday stated that the finance ministry must instruct the tax authority IRS to release the confidential documents to the finance and tax committee.

src: Im Widerspruch zu politischen Gepflogenheiten in den USA hatte der Immobilienunternehmer Trump seine Steuererklärung weder als Kandidat noch später als Präsident öffentlich gemacht. Er wehrte sich bis vor das Oberste Gericht gegen eine Herausgabe. Eine Staatsanwaltschaft in New York hat die Unterlagen inzwischen erhalten, allerdings durften daraus keine Details öffentlich werden - es sei denn, es käme zu einem Prozess.
ref: In contradiction to political customs in the USA, real estate entrepreneur Trump had not made his tax returns public either as a candidate or later as president. He resisted disclosure all the way to the Supreme Court. A prosecutor's office in New York has since obtained the documents, but no details were allowed to be made public - unless the matter came to trial.
draft_translation: Contrary to political customs in the United States, real estate developer Trump never made his tax return public either as a candidate or later as president. He resisted until before the Supreme Court against disclosure. A New York state attorney general has now obtained the documents, although no details could be made public unless a trial occurred.

src: Die Herausgabe an den Kongress ist für Trump wohl heikler: Dort ist der Kreis der Zugriffsberechtigten etwas größer und unter bestimmten Bedingungen könnten im Lauf der Untersuchung des Ausschusses einzelne Details veröffentlicht werden. Zudem dringt aus dem Parlament auch immer wieder Vertrauliches nach außen.
ref: The disclosure to Congress is probably more sensitive for Trump: There, the circle of those authorized to access the information is somewhat larger and, under certain conditions, individual details could be published in the course of the committee's investigation. Furthermore, confidential information from Congress is also repeatedly leaked to the outside.
draft_translation: The handover to Congress is more delicate for Trump: there is a larger circle of people with access, and under certain conditions, individual details could be published during the investigation by the committee. Additionally, confidential information often leaks out to the outside from the Parliament.

src: Die Vorsitzende des Repräsentantenhauses, die Demokratin Nancy Pelosi, begrüßte die Entscheidung umgehend als einen "Sieg für den Rechtsstaat". Zugang zu den Steuerunterlagen des Republikaners sei eine Frage der nationalen Sicherheit, schrieb sie auf Twitter. "Das amerikanische Volk verdient es, die Fakten zu seinen Interessenskonflikten und zu seiner Aushöhlung unserer Sicherheit als Präsident zu kennen", erklärte Pelosi.
ref: The House Speaker, Democrat Nancy Pelosi, immediately welcomed the decision as a "victory for the rule of law." Access to the Republican's tax records is a matter of national security, she wrote on Twitter. "The American people deserve to know the facts about his conflicts of interest and his undermining of our security as president," Pelosi declared.
draft_translation: The chairwoman of the House, Democrat Nancy Pelosi, immediately welcomed the decision as a "victory for the rule of law." Access to the tax documents of the Republican is a matter of national security, she wrote on Twitter. "The American people deserve to know the facts about their interest conflicts and the erosion of our security as president," explained Pelosi.
final_translation: The chairwoman of the House, Democrat Nancy Pelosi, immediately welcomed the decision as a "victory for the rule of law." Access to the tax documents of the Republican is a matter of national security, she wrote on Twitter. "The American people deserve to know the facts about their interests and the erosion of our security as a president," explained Pelosi.

src: Kabarett in der Bastion: Zwischen Geburt und Tod spielt das Leben
ref: Cabaret at the Bastion: Life plays between birth and death
draft_translation: Kabarett in der Bastion: Between Birth and Death, Life Plays
final_translation: Kabarett in der Bastion: Between Birth and Death, Life plays

src: Kirchheim. Pasta oder Pizza? Samsung oder Apple? Welchen Handy-Vertrag bei den vielen Angeboten? Bleiben oder Schluss machen? Entweder - oder? Als Sklaven der Zeit hetzen die die Leute von heute von Termin zu Termin und schieben manchmal Menschen und Hamburger einfach so dazwischen. Lucy van Kuhl zeigt in ihrem neuen Programm, dass der "Dazwischen"-Zustand etwas Aufregendes hat.
ref: Kirchheim. Pasta or pizza? Samsung or Apple? Which cell phone contract out of the many offers? Stay or break up? Either - or? As slaves to time, people today rush from appointment to appointment, and sometimes just squeeze people and hamburgers in between. Lucy van Kuhl shows in her new program that there is something exciting about the "in-between" state.
draft_translation: Kirchheim. Pasta or pizza? Samsung or Apple? Which mobile phone contract with all the offers? Stay or give up? Either-or? Today's people are slaves to time, rushing from one appointment to another and sometimes pushing people and hamburgers right in the middle. Lucy van Kuhl shows in her new program that the "in-between" state can be exciting.
final_translation: Kirchheim. Pasta or pizza? Samsung or Apple? Which mobile phone contract with all the offers? Stay or quit? Either-or? Today's people are slaves to time, rushing from one appointment to another and sometimes pushing people and hamburgers right in between. Lucy van Kuhl shows in her new program that the "in-between" state can be exciting.

src: Auf humorvoll-nachdenkliche Art erzählt und besingt Lucy van Kuhl Situationen aus dem Leben. In ihren sensiblen Chansons und knackig-pointierten Kabarett-Liedern bringt sie vieles auf den Punkt - und das Ein oder Andere steht auch zwischen den Zeilen. Los geht's am Samstag, 18. Februar, um 20.30 Uhr im Kirchheimer Club Bastion.
ref: In a humorous and thoughtful way, Lucy van Kuhl tells and sings about situations from life. In her sensitive chansons and crisp cabaret songs, she gets to the heart of many matters - and one or two things are also written between the lines. It all starts on Saturday, February 18th, at 8.30 p.m. at Kirchheim's Club Bastion.
